name: Yuiitsu and Sei

description: Two worlds stand at the brink of collapse. One world's mana continue to decrease at a dangerous pace, slowly destroying the lands without anyone knowing it. Another has so much mana, that those who are weak to mana are slowly dying due to mana intoxication. The goddess could stand it no longer, so she made a choice, one that will change the two worlds forever. Shorter Synopsis: Op protagonist in fantasy world the end :V Warning: I'm a terrible writer and this'll probably give you cancer, so shoo! EDIT: This'll FOR SURE give you cancer, so shoo!

chapters.name: Prologue Yuiitsu and Sei
chapters.content:
Prologue

In a grand arena, three figures are seen fighting.

On one side is two twin little girls around the age of 12, with closed eyes, a blade in each hand, black and white long hair flowing down their head respectively. The white haired girl wore a pretty white dress filled with black frills, making her look like an cute adorable angel, while the other black haired girl wore a pretty black dress of the same design with white frills.

The blades in their hands are both black and white respectively and with 5 rings on each hand, a beautiful golden pendant around their necks, their impeccable timing with each other made it look like the dance of two fairies.

On the opposite side, was a gigantic golden dragon, the pressure that he gave out did not make him feel like a king, nor a emperor, but instead, that of a god.

The golden scales that looked like it could repel any attack, the golden sharp claws that looked like it could slash through everything and with a pair of gigantic horns on his head, they fought.

But now, the golden scales have lost its shimmer, the sharp claws have become dull, and one of his two great horns was cut off, making him look like a wounded beast.

The two girls, however, look completely fine with not a single cut on their skin, but that is not really the case, because if you look on top of their heads, a single hp bar is shown which has been drained until 5%.

Both sides were at death’s door and the next attack would decide it all.

The dragon flapped its two great wings and prepared itself to end it all in his next attack, the mana gathered in its mouth was such a great amount that it actually looked like it was distorting the air around him.

Seeing this, the player controlling the girls decided to use his trump card too. The eyes of the two girls instantly sprung open revealing a symbol of a balance in each one and a gigantic black and white wing grew out of their back respectively. One wing on each of them, meaning they had to flap at the perfect time or else they’ll plummet to the earth below.

Flying into the sky, every one of their move was the same as the dragons, from a the movement of a finger, to the blinking of the eyes, everything was exactly the same.

The dragon, noticed this, but did not know what they were planning to do because obviously, they as humans cannot copy a dragon’s breath attack.

As he gathered more and more mana, the girls did the exact same in their mouth, and instantly, the dragon knew something was wrong. Humans were not supposed to have the dragon’s breath attack nor could their body endure the recoil to use it, but it’s already too late now, so he gambled everything on this one attack.

[Divine Obliteration]

[God’s Scale]

The Golden Ray was the dragon’s ultimate attack. Simple yet powerful. Gathering all his mana into his mouth and blasting it off with all his might, the most destructive attack he had. Mixed with his own special energy Golden Divine Energy, which only he is supposed to have, it can be considered the strongest attack in the world that can even kill middle to higher rank gods.

The twin girls however, did exactly the same. By imitating every move of the dragon, from his breathing, blinking to his fidgeting and flapping of the wing, they copied everything and what they did not have, they created with their powers just so they can copy the dragon.

The author's tale has been misappropriated; report any instances of this story on Amazon.

And with every move copied perfectly, they used God’s Scale, an ability that lets them fire the exact same attack with the exact same force, but if they miss a single movement, the magic would not fire and they would be sitting ducks.

Luckily, or rather skillfully, they copied every movement perfectly and perfectly fired the same beam back at the dragon.

As the two beams of equal strength collided, the arena started to crumble, the ground cracked, the air shook and everything was falling apart.

As the beam slowly died down on both sides, the twins readied their next attack, but the dragon could not move. It used all its mana in that one attack leaving it with nothing left, but the girls still had some. No they did not have any left, but using their powers they converted what little hp they had into mana.

Seeing this, the dragon smiled, it was not a smile of arrogance thinking how could such a small attack beat me, but instead, it was the smile of a warrior that has finally met it’s match.

[Ying Yang Blast]

It just floated there in the sky and watched as the ball mixed with light and dark magic came flying at it. It did not try to evade, nor did it struggle, it just floated there in all its majestic glory.

And as the magic hit him, the little hp he had left were gone.

The dragon shattered into a million pieces of light that fell from the sky.

The virtual reality game’s final boss Dragon God Daeneries was defeated.

And the player behind the twin girls that defeated it, mysteriously disappeared at the exact same time.

---

As I opened my eyes, the first thing I thought was where the hell am I. The last thing I remember was playing the famous game called Elenair fighting the final boss of the Tower of God which was said to have been undefeated in the 5 years since the game began.

Even the strongest players couldn’t solo it with its ability to fly and ultimate attack that cannot be blocked and has to be dodged, it’s said to be unbeatable.

I remember I just beat it after 2 hours of hard work and now my head hurts like hell.

“I have a request for you, will you become a guardian of the gates?”

An angelic voice? Where’s it coming from.

As I looked up I saw a blonde woman wearing what could be called a simple white dress, but on her it radiated holiness. Her beautiful figure with her beautiful face made her the perfect definition of a goddess.

Looking at her I was stunned speechless, I mean why would such a beauty be in my room…

Wait…

Looking around, I’m in a white space, and when I turned, I saw another beautiful girl’s face. One in each of my vision. They looking identical, but the different dresses made them easy to distinguish.

Moving my arm to see if it’s real, both girls with did the same thing at the same time.
“”WHAT THE HELL!?”"

chapters.name: Chapter 1: Gone
chapters.content:
Chapter 1: Gone

Two angelic voices in perfect sync came out from the two girls mouths.

The girl two girls looked exactly the same, yet different. Where one was white, the other was black and where one had black, the other had white.

“Ah yes, those are the bodies you created and strengthened to the point where it allowed you to defeat a god.”

The goddess once again spoke, and instantly I remembered. The face, it’s the exact same one as the game. The closed eyes, the beautiful smooth pale skin, the perfectly proportional face and the silky lone hair, it’s the same one I created 5 years ago!

I turned my vision back to the goddess to ask.

“”Why am I here?””

Her face did not change, even as she spoke, she showed no expression on her face. The beautiful blue eyes was full of serenity that does not waver, nor change.

“I took you here child, to prevent the collapse of both worlds, I linked them, but to prevent invasion from either sides, I need a guardian on each side. The Golden Dragon God Daeneris defends his world from your side and I need one from your world to defend the other side.”

I see, she needed a guardian and the golden dragon was a test, the RPG and the tower were both just tests.

“Child, will you take upon the task? To make it simpler I have given you the body you created and used to beat the Dragon God, which has itself ascended into godhood.”

“”what about my old body?””

“I froze it in time in case you reject the offer.”

Eh? Doesn’t that mean I can return to everyday life?

But do I really want to… I mean I have no family, dropped out of high school and works at a gas station with barely any friends and no lover. I have a hard time making enough money to live anyways…

The only one who might miss me is Takashi, but he’ll be fine. Probably?

Wait I just remembered! I got tons of money in this character, and it’s super strong, so I got nothing to worry about meaning I can just laze around and eat!

WOOHOO LAZY FOR LIFE!

I can also try all those anime food that seem delicious!

With a wide grin on their faces and a little bit of drool on the side of their mouths, the twins replied to the goddess “”There’s nothing holding me back, so I will guard the gate from the other side, but can you grant me a single wish?””

“And what is that?”

“”Let me roam the world, I want to see the world that I am defending against, but if challengers reach the gate, then I will do my duty. But until then, I do not want to be bored sitting around doing nothing.””

Yup totally because of boredom, not because I’m going to try all the food in the world!

“Fair enough, you will guard the lowest level of the Dungeon of Origin, the one that links the two worlds, and whenever someone reaches your room and enters, you will be automatically teleported, fair enough?”

“”Thank you for granting my request””

And with that, she disappeared. Literally disappeared into thin air and the white room slowly darkened into a cave.

This story originates from Royal Road. Ensure the author gets the support they deserve by reading it there.

The Cave was a huge semicircle. With a radius of around 250 meters, it was enormous and at two ends of the cave were a door and what seemed like a crack in space. Through the crack I could see a gigantic gold tail.

Wait… I KNOW THAT TAIL! IT’S THE DRAGON’S! Wow, so he was a god all along huh… I guess I’ll go visit him once in a while, since the in game version of him never talked, I wonder what he’s like.

The other side was a door, a door with the carving of two beautiful little girls on each side holding a balance in hand…

Wait… THAT’S MY CHARACTER! I guess this means I’m the final boss? I wonder what happens if I die…

Well first things first, looking back at my two new bodies, I tried moving, since operating 4 arms is going be a pain, but surprisingly, they worked the same way as the game.

I know I’m supposed to be a man and try to touch those, but… isn’t this wrong? I mean they’re only 12 years old… even if they’re super-duper cute and so adorable I want to hug them...

*sigh* I was never really that curious about it I guess, but seriously, THE SKIN IS SILK SMOOTH AND THE HAIR TOO FEELS SO GOOD TO TOUCH!!!!

aaaahhh…. The super soft skin that instantly sank in when touched and the smooth silky hair that feels like the finest silk made my face instantly relax.

“At least you two are enjoying this.”

A loud voice that shook the cave sounded out from behind me, which made me jump up in surprise.

A giant eyeball… the distorted space showed a giant slit eyeball… Even though I can probably guess who it is, it’s still scary turning around to see a frigging gigantic snake like eye staring at you…

…””Are you stuck?”…

“WHAT! NO! I’m not stuck you idiots, I’m supposed to guard this side from intruders, but beside you two, almost none have come and the ones that came can’t stand a single hit, so come over here, let’s spar!”

“”WHAT NO! go find someone at your own level””

“but the only one at my level is you two. Is there anybody else nearby that’s a god?”

“”What are you talking about I’m not a god, I’m human””

“check your statuses then”

Status

Name: Yuiitsu and Sei
Race: High God

Gender: None
Job: Balance God

Rank: SSS
…

GENDER NONE!? AND RANK SSS!? I swear I was rank A before when I fought Daeneries, but more importantly! GENDER NONE!!!!!!?????

I instantly flipped up my skirt to check

“HEY HEY HEY! DO YOU KNOW NO SHAME WOMAN!”

Being changed to a girl is fine… I mean it doesn’t matter to me whether I’m a man or a woman since with technology now, genders can be changed easily… BUT THIS!? WHAT THE HELL IS THIS! HOW DO I USE THE WASHROOM WITH NOTHING!!!!

Doesn’t this also mean I’ll never be able to feel pleasure again!? NOOOOOOO!!!!! orz

“Sooooo about that spar”

“”SHUT UP LEAVE ME ALONE!!!””

chapters.name: Chapter 2: Byosu
chapters.content:
I swear does no one read the warning these days? @>@ if you're still here, it either means you got nerves of steel, you already got cancer or some third reason that I have absolutely no clue about...

---

Chapter 2: Byosu

The same time that Yuiitsu and Sei appeared in the cave, Elenair changed…

Throughout the world beings appeared out of thin air…

They appeared mostly in cities, but not many appeared. In a city, only 10 or so appeared.

The men had black long black hair, one closed eye with a yin symbol inside, a single demonic hand with claws and they looked exactly like a human besides the hole in their sternum. The women on the other hand had long white hair, the other eye closed with an yang symbol inside, a white angelic hand and they also looked exactly like humans except their hole was at the stomach.

Wearing all sorts of different clothing that has never been seen in this world, they wandered. Some were young, some were old, some were cheerful, some were shy, some were kind, some were mean, but they all had something in common.

They all knew nothing about this world…

They had knowledge of technology that is much more advanced than the world, they knew of money systems and mathematics that were not from this world and they all thought a piece of them was missing…

Every one of their knowledge was incomplete, yet the things they knew were far more advanced than this world.

Although this is something that is incredibly abnormal, the residents of this world easily accepted it, because they knew, this means a new high god has been born.

---

“soooo are the two of you going to stop squatting there and drawing stuff in the dirt? It’s been hours…”

Why can’t this stupid dragon leave me alone, let me create the RECOVER MAN/WOMANHOOD PLAN in peace…

“are you done yet?”

Shut up…

“how about now?”

SHUT UP!

“hey hey, how about now?”

“wana have a spar with a high god now?”

FOR THE LOVE OF GOD SOMEONE SHUT THIS DRAGON UP!

Wait, he’s a high god… HE MIGHT KNOW SOMETHING ABOUT THIS!

“”Hey Daeneries, what gender are you?””

“Hahaha, obviously I’m genderless like all high gods, sorry girls, can’t mate with you no matter how attracted you are to me.”

…this stupid overgrown lizard… who the hell would be attracted to a gigantic golden lizard

But that line, all high gods being genderless?

“”Why’re all high gods genderless?””

“I see what you are doing, you two want to change my gender to mate with me don’t you, well too bad. We are handed this position by the goddess and each of us govern an element or race. If we are able to reproduce and more high gods appear, the world will be flooded by new kinds of elements and races.”

I see... that does make sense.

Wait does this mean I get my own race? WOOHOO!!

You might be reading a pirated copy. Look for the official release to support the author.

““Hey Daeneries, what are the Balance race like? Or Balance element?””

“What in the world are you talking about? There are no…”

“Yes?”

Why did he freeze mid-sentence and why is he narrowing his eyes! Uh oh…

“YOU TWO! YOU GUYS HAVE BECOME HIGH GODS HAVEN’T YOU!”

“”Uh….. maybe?””

Oh crud, I hope he doesn’t attack again. I still haven’t mastered this body yet.

“HAHAHAHAHAHA! FINALLY A WORTHY OPPONENT OF THE SAME RANK! COME LET US BATTLE TO THE DEATH!”

“”EHHHHHHH!?””

What just happened?

“What are you two waiting for? Come on, let’s fight, oh how fun this’ll be!”

Is his brain fried? Or is he just mentally retarded? I mean fight to the deaths!? Why the hell would I want to fight him to the deaths when I don’t even want to spar with him?

“Come on, don’t worry about it. We can’t die anyways, so let’s have some fun!”

“”Wait, we can’t die?””

“Ah, the goddess didn’t tell you did she? What did she tell you about your new race?”

“”Nothing?””

“Wow, she must be really tired from connecting the two worlds then. Well worry not, your senior high god will teach you.”

“You see, high gods each govern a race or element meaning we are that race and that race is us. Without us, the race or element will disappear from the world, but with us here, the race will continue to spawn in the world, even if it goes extinct.”

“Now because we are the race or element itself, if one of us disappears the world will change greatly. For instance, if the water high god disappeared, there will be no water. So to ensure that never happens, each of us are made to be able to never age and respawn when we die. The respawn location is set by the goddess, so it cannot be changed.”

“To make sure we don’t multiply, the goddess made us unable to reproduce, and we also cannot do eat, breath or excrete, this is to help prevent our deaths.”
Can’t eat… can’t eat… can’t eat…

NOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!! YOU FIRST TAKE AWAY MY PLEASURE AND NOW YOU TAKE AWAY MY ABILITY TO EAT! CURSE YOU GODDESS WHYYY!!!!! Orz

“Yea, I know you must be sad because you can’t reproduce with the great me. But worry not, we can enjoy ourselves with a bout! TO THE DEATH!”

SCREW THIS I’M LEAVING!

As I slowly get up and walk towards the door, I hear screaming coming from the dragon.

“Wait, where are you going? Come back! Come on, just a fight to the death! A single one! come back! Wait, just a little spar!”

Stupid dragon. If I have to suffer, so will you!

Opening the door, I turned around and with a straight face I replied with a single word.

“”No!””

And I slammed the door shut!
TAKE THAT YOU RETARDED YELLOW LIZARD!

chapters.name: Chapter 3: Dungeon
chapters.content:
Chapter 3: Dungeon

On the other side of the door was literally another world…

There’s no other way to describe it, it was heaven yet at the same time hell!

The place looked as if it was perfectly cut in the middle.

On the left side was like heaven, a marble palace styled like the ancient Greek’s pantheon of gods sat in the middle of a huge forest, that was beautiful beyond compare. The lake was pure and so clean that it was sparkling, while the fruits on the trees were perfectly ripe.

The people were beautiful beyond compare and not just one or two, but every single one of them. They had ten wings, five on each side and they each wore full metal body armour that covered their body from the neck down and they all looked young while radiating light. With all sorts of weapons in hand, they lived in perfect harmony with nature around them.

The light radiating out of each of the beings, filled their world with light. So much that it even made me forget I was underground for a second.

I even saw the water in the lake rising before forming a human shape and slowly, the water fell off, revealing the figure of a beautiful naked women with ten wings. As she walked out of the lake, the earth rose around her and hardened becoming full body metal armour and a spear.

The other side, however, was like hell…

It was a lifeless black land, filled with pools of magma. There were no signs of nature on it from one end to the other. The wall of earth on the other side seemed like a safe haven compared to the eerily black land. The pitch black land consumed all light and not just in a figuratively way. Light that got in from the left side fell to the earth as if it was as heavy as metal and disappeared as if it were consumed. The only source of light on the land, was light being radiated from the magma and that red light mixed with the eerily dark land made it seem like it was hell itself.

The residents of the land were also human figures of great beauty wearing little to no cloths. They had dark red skin with magnificently large horns protruding out of the two sides of their head. With two great black wings, a long jet black scaly tail, claws for hands and three big talon for feet, they were like demons from books brought to life.

They lived however they want on the land. Some bathing in the magma, others fought painting the black land red, while others eating each other both figuratively and literally. And whenever one dies, the land itself opens and becomes a big jaw with teeth that rises and devours the body before spitting the being out again in perfect shape and returning back to being earth. The being that was spat out continues his previous actions as if he never died.

Yup, I’m avoiding the right side. It wouldn’t be funny if the beings or even the earth tried to eat me or kill me.

Slowly walking down the stone stairs that led to the door to my room, I moved towards the left side and as soon as I stepped on the grass, every single one of the figures turned to me.

The beings all stopped what they were doing before turning to me…

What am I supposed to say in this circumstance?

“”Um… hi?””

I said a single word! JUST A GREETING! And every single one of them took to the skies and rushed towards me! WHAT THE HELL!

I mean they look strong!

And there’s over a hundred of them!

Turning around the twins ran back up to the stairs for the door, but once they reached the top, two figures landed before the door.

The demonic looking one was the same as the others. She was wearing what seems to be lack stripes that coil around her body with a blood red double sided sword in hand. The angelic looking one, also looked the same as the others,  but her armour only covered her chest, arms, legs and lower area. In her hand was two blades that bent back. A blue line was stretched across the two tips of the blade forming a bow, but no arrows were anywhere in sight. Looking closer, one can see the yin and yang symbols floating around their eyes in opposite directions.

The author's content has been appropriated; report any instances of this story on Amazon.

While Yuiitsu and Sei were sizing up their opponents, the angelic and demonic figures from the back has also caught up, so the twins are pincered from both sides.

There’s nowhere to run, so I guess I have to fight. I hope Daeneries wasn’t lying when he said we can’t die, because I think I’m about to find out.

Pulling their twin swords out from the inventory, the twins took a stance and was ready for battle, but what happened next was out of their expectations.

“Goddess-samas, what are your orders?”

Both the angelic and demonic figures kneeled around them, with bowed heads and a big smile on their face, they stared at the twins waiting intently for their masters’ orders.

Staring at the scene in front of them, Yuiitsu and Sei’s mind blanked out. The actions that the beings were doing was so incomprehensible that they had no idea how to answer.

“Is something the matter goddess-samas?” the angelic and demonic figure at the top of the stairs asked.

“”Why’re you calling me goddess-samas?””

The angelic and demonic being with had a puzzled face and looked at each other. Then with tilted heads they replied,

“Well goddess-samas, there are two of you, therefore we call you goddess-samas instead of goddess-sama?”

Oh right… I have two bodies now, I really need to remember that or people are going to call me odd. Better start using us before it’s too late. But that’s not the main problem.

“”No, I do not mean why you call us goddess-samas, but why do you call us goddess?””

“You are the god of balance, the god of our race, the Byosu.”

Oh… so these are the race I govern… weird why’re there two types of them?

At least my race looks strong, I mean they look extremely similar to devils and angels from my old world, and I heard all kinds of myths about their power.

I wonder if they hate each other like in the stories, having my race gone extinct because of an internal dispute is not going to be funny…

“”Do the two of you hate each other?””

“No goddess-samas, we live separately in balance, so neither side bothers the other.”

“And even if we had to pick yes or no, we’d pick no ya know, because we change depending on which side is in charge ya see.””

That’s a load of relief, I guess my race isn’t going extinct any time soon.

“Goddess-samas, do you have any orders for us?”

“”Ah, no there are no questions at the moment.””

“I see…”

The white Byosu answered with a sad look.

“”But we do have a question. How do we get out of here?””

“Oh, you can climb the stairs on the other side. There are 100 floors in the Dungeon of Origin, so please be careful goddess-samas.”

EH!? 100 FLOORS!? WHERE IN THE WORLD ARE WE?????

“Also, are we allowed to follow you goddess-samas? Since ya know, we can demonstrate our usefulness.”

I hope she doesn’t mean what I think she means…

*gulp* “”All of you?...””
“Yup!”

chapters.name: Chapter 4: Raid Boss
chapters.content:
Chapter 4: Raid Boss

“”No.””

“Please?”

“”No!””

“Pretty please?”

“”NO!””

“Ehhhh, but whyyyyyyyy?”

Why the hell would I bring all of them out with me!? Can you imagine how much chaos a gigantic army appearing out of a dungeon would cause? Also I’m not even sure if they know common sense. Like those stupid characters in novels I read, if they start killing everything in sight or calling everyone they meet an insect, that’s going to be a pain to deal with.

There’s also the problem of food and water, where the hell do I get enough for an army this big!?

All I want is to go out and eat food, not wage war against the whole world god dammit!

*sigh* Time to make up some random excuse and hope they go along with it.

“”Because we need you guys to protect… “”

“Protect?”

“”Um…””

“Um?”

“”this door?””

I mean this door is pretty well made, it looked like it was sculpted by a master and now that I look closely… it gives off a weird purple glow? Yea, I had no better idea… This is obviously not going to work, PLAN B RUN FOR IT!

“Ah! We understand goddess-samas, you want us to guard your temple, we shall protect it with all our might!”

“””BY YOUR WILL!”””

Escape plan number 1, I’ll first run to gain speed, jump over them and fly… wait what…

When did this become my temple!? And why are you guys so happy to… oh screw it, I’m getting out of here!

The twins put on the rest of their battle gear that was so badly damaged by the dragon that they auto unequipped, which were magically repaired by the goddess. They Opened their wings and ran towards the stairs, deciding to jump and fly to the other side, then slowly climb the dungeon.

A plan this simple can’t possible go wrong, but why do I hear a beeping soun… Oh crap!

As they took the next step, blue light engulfed the twin and they disappeared.

---

There are many races throughout the world, the humans, demons, beastkin, dragonkin, elves and dwarfs. The world that was split into three small wars became one great war instead. It used to be the humans versus demons, the elves versus the dwarfs and the dragonkin versus the beastkin, but then the humans, elves and beastkin created an alliance and to answer, the demons, dwarfs and dragonkin did as well.

The world was split into two and this fight continued for millenniums, until 200 years ago.

The Dungeon of Origin was created hundreds of years ago in Elenair, the goddess that created it disappeared alongside the dragon god right after creating it, leaving behind nothing except for the dungeon in the center of the six capitals.

At first everyone just thought the goddess was sleeping, but after hundreds of years, she has still not returned. Every single race was worried. They did not know what happened to their beloved goddess who created the world and watched over it. Some went searching for the high gods, to learn of what happened to the goddess, but they didn’t know, others went around the world looking for her, but none found her. With the threat of monsters throughout the land, every race forced a ceasefire to search for the goddess. The dedication the people had for the goddess was real and in these one hundred years, almost every inch of Elenair was searched, except for this dungeon…

The reason they didn’t search the dungeon was not because they didn’t want to or didn’t try, but because they couldn’t. Even with the strongest adventurer from every race, they only got down to the 70th floor, where they were eradicated by the floor boss.

In the 30th floor boss room,

Six adventurers were fighting against the floor boss Great White Snake in the closed boss room.

“Katsuro move! It’s the poison breath!” (Riku)

“Understood” (Katsuro)

Although he had full heavy armour on and a great shield with a mace, the dragonkin, Katsuro, was still able to dodge the poisonous breath.

“Ren, attack it’s head, Haruto, defend her!” (Riku)

“Okie dok” (Ren)

“Hey! Slow down Ren!” (Haruto)

“Why don’tcha speed up?” (Ren)

“WELL I CAN’T CATCH UP TO A TIGERKIN EVEN IF I SPEED UP!” (Haruto)

“Relax, this is a B+ boss, and we’re all A- ranks” (Ren)

“Don’t you remember, the ranking system is different for monsters, a monster with rank B+ is equal to 6 B+ adventurers.” (Haruto)

“And we’re A-, so relax, I’m going on ahead!” (Ren)

After that, the tigerkin, Ren, who was barely wearing anything, leaped around the snake’s head attacking it from all directions with her claws, leaving a very pissed off human, Haruto, in leather armour trying to keep up and protect her from the tail’s attack, but halfway he just gave up and started attacking the tail with his sword and shield.

*Sigh* “Sora…” (Riku)

“Don’t worry already on it” (Sora) and with that, ice shackles appeared all around the snakes body, trying to tie it down.

*Sigh* “Thanks, thank god we don’t have a second Ren or Haruto, just having them is bad enough.” (Riku)

“Um… Uhhhhh” (Aya)

“Don’t worry Aya, you’re doing great, just keep healing and buffing Katsuro.” (Riku)

“Un!” (Aya)

After giving the Human girl, Aya, confidence, the elf archer, Riku, notched another arrow and aimed at one of the snake’s eyes. Seeing this, the elf mage, Sora, focused his ice shackles around the snake’s head and neck.

After hours, the snake had an arrow in each eye, and it was bleeding everywhere. The white scales were dyed red with a tint of green, and the tail was cut off, it could no longer struggle against the ice chains binding it and fell to the ground.

“Ren! Haruto! Finish it!” (Riku)

[Cleave]

[Empower]

With the armour scales gone from the neck, Haruto’s Cleave was able to easily cut into the snake’s neck, but due to the sheer size of the snake, he could only cute off 3/4 of the neck. That’s where Ren comes in, with her incredible speed and empowered her claws, she was able to separate the head from the body.

Stolen from Royal Road, this story should be reported if encountered on Amazon.

The greenish red blood spewed everywhere covering most of the area around the snake. Katsuro was far away, defending the Riku, Sora and Aya, so the four of them did not get splashed by it. However, Ren and Haruto weren’t so lucky, they were at point blank range, and could not avoid getting fully drenched in the poisonous blood.

“Aya! Quick, heal them, the blood’s poisonous!” (Riku)

“Un!... got it” (Aya)

[Detoxify]

“Phew, thanks Aya, you really saved me” (Haruto)

“Aya-chan! You healed Haruto first! Does that mean what I think it means?” (Ren)

“EHHHHH!!!” (Aya)

“Awww my cute innocent Aya is growing up, onee-chan is proud” (Ren)

“NO! That’s not it!” (Aya)

“It’s fine, don’t worry onee-chan will support you, even if you’re after the no good weakling.” (Ren)

“HEY!” (Haruto)

“Um… I don’t think Haruto is weak…” (Aya)

“EH!? So you’re not going to deny you’re after him? How courageous!” (Ren)

“Ah! NO!!!!! I’m not after him!” (Aya)

“it’s okay, it’s okay onee-chan knows, you’re just shy, don’t worry, onee-chan will help you!” (Ren)

And the three of them continued messing around. With Ren teasing Aya whose face is as red as a tomato and ocassionally sneaking insults in while teasing Haruto. On the other side, the three grown men were gathering the material from the snake.

“Look who gets all the girls.” (Riku)

“Haha, it’ll be nice to be young again I guess” (Sora)

“Come on, you two are younger than me, I’m already over 90!” (Katsuro)

“Well mentally I guess, since your race in human terms in over 40, but technically, we’re still older, since we’re over 120” (Riku)

“Cmon Riku, you know our age in human terms are only around 30” (Sora)

“I guess… *sigh* we’re old… HEY GUYS! WE’RE DONE COLLCTING LET’S MOVE!” (Riku)

“”Coming””

And the party of six was just about to move on to the next room, when the doors that opened after the floor boss’s death slammed down and closed themselves.

“What’s going on!” (Haruto)

“No clue, my Trap Detection skill isn’t going off. Sora?” (Riku)

“I don’t sense any magi… WAIT! Magic is gathering at the center of the room!” (Sora)

“Everyone! Get ready for battle!” (Riku)

The six veteran adventurers instantly got ready and as the mood tensed, a blue light shined in the middle of the room.

From the blue light, twin girls with closed eyes appeared. Their beauty was out of this world. With luxurious dresses, five rings on each hand, a necklace, a white and black cloth wrapped around the sole of their feet and arms like bracers respectively, and a black and white ribbon on the opposite sides of their heads combined with the gigantic black and white wing coming out of their backs, they looked as beautiful as the goddess herself!

The party stood there speechless, not knowing what to do.

They have never heard of any monster like them, nor any beings with a single gigantic black or white wing.

The party literally did not know what to do. They stood there admiring the beauty of the twin goddesses that appeared.

The first one to regain his consciousness was Riku, being the party leader, he was the first to snap out of their stupor and immediately used Identify on them.

The result, however, left him speechless…

Name: ???Race: ???

Gender: ???Job: ???

Rank: ???Strength: ???

Intelligence: ???Agility: ???

Magic Power: ???

There was no age… there was no age in identify! It could only mean one thing, the beings in front of him could not age and only highly evolved entities could not age meaning they’re extremely strong! Question marks is the result given if the stat of the target is a lot higher than the users, that he can understand, but the stats the beings has… It frightened him extremely! There was no defensive stat, only attack and more attack meaning these two in front of him, were power type monsters and those are usually the more aggressive type. With two monsters that is way out of their league being possibly extremely aggressive, it was the worst situation possible. This same result was returned from both of them, meaning their party had to face not 1, but two of them! It was insane!

Riku immediately shouted his teammates names to get them out of their stupor and they reacted. Katsuro immediately stepped in front to block any incoming attack. Behind him stood Haruto and Ren in a V formation protecting Aya within. Behind Aya, stood Riku and sora, defending the back from possible attacks. It was their strongest defensive formation, the diamond formation, but the situation was still critical. The best he can hope for, is to buy time for Sora to activate the Return magic to send as many of them alive as possible out of the dungeon.

As sweat rolled down from his forehead, he quickly made hand signs, signaling Sora, telling him the plan, while watching the beings every move. He already gambled on screaming at his teammates to get them out of their stupor, so he could not risk agitating the beings anymore, and chose to make hand signs for Sora to read.

After sora read the plan, he immediately used Thought Transfer to tell his teammates, and as he finished telling his teammates the plan, the beings tilted their heads in the opposite directions, and a pair of angelic voices rang out.

““What are you guys doing?””
THEY CAN TALK IN THE SAME LANGUAGE AS US!?

chapters.name: Chapter 5: Choice
chapters.content:
Chapter 5 Choice

The two girls did talk… this means they have intelligence, maybe I can negotiate our way out. Or at least buy time for Sora.

They also said the same things at the same time, they must know each other very well. Considering their looks and cloths, I think they might be twins. But this just makes it more weird, I’ve never heard of any race like that, and if their monsters, they shouldn’t know how to speak so fluently…

With hand signs I signal Sora to continue the plan of escaping, while I try to get some information out of them.

“So, who are you two?” (Riku)

“”Yuiitsu and Sei””

“So, which is yuiitsu?” (Riku)

And the twins both made a displeased face.

Did I say something wrong? Crap, I hope I didn’t accidentally insult them or something, two enraged beasts are worse than two normal ones!

I prepared myself for combat, but they just stood there with the displeased look…

After a few minutes, the one that wore a black dress answered,

“I am Yuiitsu”

“And I am Sei”

“Now, what are you doing?” (Yuiitsu)

“In this dungeon today?” (Sei)

Ehhhh!??? Before they talked in sync, now they speak in parts!? Although with their looks, I find it surprisingly cute, it’s still scary. For two people to be this in sync, fighting them will not be like when we usually fight multiple enemies, where we can use one to impede the other. It’s best not to make them into enemies…

“We’re here to try to find information on the goddess’s disappearance.” (Riku)

THEIR FACES TWITCHED! BOTH OF THEM! They know something!

(Sora! Get the teleportation spell ready, but don’t use it, they know something about the goddess’s disappearance.) (Riku)

(Got it.) (Sora)

“”We see, however, your journey will prove to be… unfruitful…””

THEY DO KNOW! And they admitted it too… This might be the first advance in our search for the goddess in hundreds of years! We can’t let this chance slip by.

But before Riku could think of a way to pull information out of the twins in front of him,

“WHAT DID YOU DO TO THE GODDESS!” (Haruto)

Shit, that stupid hot headed Haruto, he’s going to get us all killed!

“HARUTO STOP!” (Riku)

“What!? Don’t you want to know what happened to the goddess too!” (Haruto)

“I…” (Riku)

“No one in the world knows what happened to her! Not even the high gods! Doesn’t that mean something has happened to her! And yet they sound like they knows, doesn’t that mean they’ve done something to our goddess!” (Haruto)

“”we did nothing””

“Yes you did!” (Haruto)

““No we did not!””

Haruto couldn’t take it anymore and ran in with his sword and shield in hand. But right as he reached the twins,

“WATCH OUT!” (Sora)

“”Eh!?””

The shadow behind him rose up, into the form of a second Haruto and slashed towards the original, but the attack was blocked by a holy barrier.

“I won’t let you” (Aya)

This time Riku noticed Aya’s shadow rising,

Shit I won’t let you!

As Riku shot the arrow, a black arrow intercepted it mid-air and Aya was struck flying by the shadow Aya.

“STOP!” (Yuiitsu)

And everyone froze, understanding their current predicament.

Looking back, Haruto saw a black blade, blocked by the holy barrier created by Aya, but although he was fine, Aya was not and neither was his teammates. Behind Sora was a shadow sora, pointing a fireball at his head. Behind Riku was a shadow Riku, with 3 arrows notched in his bow, ready to fire at any time. Aya was on the floor, and behind her stood the shadow Aya, who just finished swinging her staff. As for Shadow Ren, she already had her claws around Ren’s neck and Ren still hasn’t noticed! Shadow Katsuro stood magnificently right behind Katsuro, cutting him off completely from his teammates.

“Return!” (Sei)

And the shadows all went down on one knee, before slowly dissolving into the shadow.

Ren quickly ran to Haruto’s side, while Katsuro went to help Aya up. Sora and Riku stayed vigilant,

“I apologize for my companions rash actions” (Riku)

“APOLOGIZE!? SHE ALMOST KILLED HARUTO!” (Ren)

“CALM DOWN Ren, it was Haruto’s fault for attacking first.” (Riku)

“Nnnn It’s fine” (Sei)

“But we’ve been searching for the goddess for hundreds of years, and this dungeon is one of the only places we haven’t searched yet.” (Riku)

“Fumu, I see…”(Yuuitsu)

“Yet it seems like the two of you know something about her disappearance” (Riku)

After that, awkward silence swept through the area. The group waited, hoping that they actually knows something, and is willing to share their knowledge. To help advance the search. What felt like hours to the group was actually just minutes, they waited, anticipated, but all they got was an innocent smile on the two girls faces.

In the current situation, the innocent smile felt very out of place… If they show a kind smile, and help they could understand, or a malicious smile and attack, that could also be understood, but the smile they gave off was neither.

They gave off an innocent smile… one that meant they knew nothing…

“”Sorry, but we don’t know””

It was clearly a lie… they knew something, and they already showed it too, but now they’re trying to play dumb all of a sudden. What is their plan!?

Haruto was once again filled with rage. With the sword tightly gripped in his hands, he was about to charge once more,

“Why you!” (Haruto)

“Haruto stop!” (Ren)

But the next words of the two silence him and everyone completely,

“”Although we do not know where the goddess has gone, we do know why she left as well as what her current state is.””

If you stumble upon this tale on Amazon, it's taken without the author's consent. Report it.

They were joyous, happy, exhilarated! Finally, after centuries of searching, finally a clue has appeared. However, the following words of the two were like dumping cold water on their heads. It immediately cooled them down.

“”However, nothing is free””

What could they possibly want… They have power that is beyond compare, their equipment is at least legendary if not ancient. Compared to our rare equips, that’s like heaven and earth…

As Riku followed this line of logic, slowly, beads of sweat formed on his forehead.

Do they possibly want our lives!?

Instantly, the atmosphere tensed, the group was prepared to flee at a moment’s notice, because like Riku, they all arrived at the same conclusion. One person, however, was an exception.

“Tell me! What do you want for the information. I’ll do anything if it’s within my power.” (Haruto)

“”Oh? Even if it might cost you your life?””

With a firm look, Haruto responded “Yes”. Not once did his eye stray from the twin’s gaze, which lead her smile to widen. It was no longer an innocent, clueless smile, but instead, one of admiration.

Shit, they might actually take his life!

“Ren!” (Riku)

“On it!” (Ren)

But before Ren could get to him, Haruto was surrounded by 2 orbs, one white and one black rotating around him. Not knowing what it was, Ren chose not to move closer, because if she move carelessly, she might cause more harm than good.

“”Why are you willing to go to such lengths for the goddess?””

With a daring smile, Haruto replied, “remember, nothing is free”

“”Haha, what goes around comes around, fine, take this!””

“NO!” (Ren)

The group watched in horror as the two balls spun faster and faster, leaving behind a trail of black and white, before disappearing completely, leaving behind an unconscious Haruto in the center, lying on the ground with a pained expression. The leather armour on his back looked like it was burned off, revealing his bare back with what looked like a scale, on the left of the scale was a shield of pure white, one that gave off a divine feel, while on the right was a sword, so black that it looked like the embodiment of evil.

“WHAT DID YOU DO TO HIM!” (Ren)

“”Ask him yourself when he wakes up, here also take this.””

With that Yuiitsu and Sei threw a single crystal at the group. It was a tetragon blue summoning crystal, it was a rare crystal that is a onetime use item, which can summon a being. No one knows how it was made as well as what it summons, but they did know the summoned creature is usually strong. However, the creature is not bounded to the summoner, so it was a dangerous artifact rarely used.

“”If you guys want the knowledge I have on the goddess, find a way, so that a high god can eat.””

“””EHHHHHH!?”””

What the hell!? A high god can eat!? Why would anyone want to know that!? Do they want to poison a high god? No, there’s no point since if they die, they will just resurrect… What in the world is their objective!?

Wait, finding information on high gods are hard enough, but they want a way to change a high god… THAT KIND OF THING ONLY THE GODDESS CAN DO OR ATLEAST SOMEONE AT HIGH GOD RANK!

They want us to become that strong… But why? There’s no merit for them and they only know we are trying to…

No! It can’t be! The goddess must be in trouble! And they want us to become strong enough to help her!

I see, so everything was a test, to check our determination, whether we’ll help the goddess or not!

But why not just tell us straight that the goddess is in trouble, why go around in circles?

“”But remember this, tell no one about me… Not my looks, or my existence.””

That’s a warning, not to tell anyone about them… There must be enemies in the world that their hiding from! I see, they want to help the goddess, but they lack the power and are testing to find people with enough determination to grow strong enough to help the goddess.

It seems, only Haruto was worthy huh.

“Thank you” (Riku)

Riku thanked the twins with a smile, which left the two with a baffled face.

“Come, Sora let’s go, I understand everything now.” (Riku)

“You better explain it to us when we get back.” (Ren)

“Yea, I have no idea what just happened.” (Sora)

“Don’t leave me out, I want to know too.” (Katsuro)

“Um…. How about Hatsuro, will he be fine?” (Aya)

“Yea, don’t worry, Katsuro, can you carry him?” (Riku)

“Sure” (Katsuro)

“Let’s go Sora, and once again thank you Yuiitsu and Sei.” (Riku)

“”Please t…””

But before the twins could finish their sentence, Riku’s gang disappeared.

“”ell us how to get out of here…””

“”NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!””

---

“Hey Sora, what did you think they were going to say” (Ren)

“I don’t know, how about you Katsuro” (Sora)

“I don’t know either, Aya?” (Katsuro)

“Ehhh? … ummmm maybe “Please take care”?” (Aya)

“Pfffttt, no way, they almost killed us!” (Ren)

“Yea, I agree with Ren for once, look what they did to Hatsuro” (Sora)

“No, I think Aya’s right” (Riku)

“””EHHHHH!?”””

“Did you fall for them or something!? Why do you have such a favourable impression of them!?” (Ren)

“EH!? Love!?” (Aya)

“I think Ren’s right, they did almost kill us.” (Sora)

“Riku, don’t you think they’re a bit out of your league? Be more reasonable” (Katsuro)
“Haha, no guys, I’ll explain it to you guys when we get back” (Riku)

chapters.name: Chapter 6: Help arrived sorta?
chapters.content:
Lemme just say, this chapter is a bit boring....

---

Chapter 6: Help arrived sorta?

I’M SO BOREDDDDDD

SOMEONE SAVE ME!!!!

Stupid predicament I’m in, why the hell do the frigging doors and walls have to have some stupid barrier on them!

I swear this is worse than being in the bottom of the frigging dungeon! At least I advanced, now I’m LITTERALLY stuck!

I can’t even teleport out! Since I don’t know any place on the surface! I even tried to teleport back to my boss room, but apparently, NOPE… *sigh* probably should’ve expected that you can only teleport up in a dungeon, never down, since that’d defeat the point of a dungeon.

All I wanted was to go out and try some food… Even though Daeneries was talking about how high gods can’t eat, they can taste right? I mean that’s the only hope I have left…

*sigh* Let’s think back to how this happened…

---

When the light died down, I was standing infront of six weird looking people, two had pointy ears, one was a big ass lizardman, two humans, I think, and a cat girl?

Since there’s a cat girl, I bet Takashi would love to come to this would.

We stood there for a while, and when I seriously got bored, I asked them what they were doing, which led to a surprised look. Did they think I was stupid or something?

Then the archer guy asked me about which one’s yuiitsu and honestly, I didn’t know! I mean the class Balancer is composed of two characters that you can design yourself, and people are allowed to make one name for the two of them, but I make two, but eventually forgot which one’s which!

It has been like 5 years? Well I just went eeny meeny miny moe and randomly picked one, but now that I think about it… THE WHITE ONE WAS YUIITSU FUCK!

Well whatever, can’t take back what I said.

Now, they did say something about goddess disappearing, I guess that’s when she went to connect the two worlds and is now asleep. Looking at their equipment, I doubt they’ll be able to beat me and meet the goddess, so I was trying to be helpful, but instead the stupid guy with a sword and shield accused me and attacked me!

The surprise didn’t end there either, one of my unique class passives activated! I swear that thing activates so rarely I can count the number of times it activated in the five years with one hand.

It’s a useless passive that activates if you face enemies that are over 10x weaker than you as well as over 5 times your team’s number. That crap was useless in every situation! Farming monsters 10x weaker gives you no exp and so little money, you wouldn’t even pick it up if someone dropped it. The crap summons shadow versions of the enemy and does everything they would do. The only time it might be useful was with an ant event boss, which summoned endless weak minions, but when [Shadow Balancer] activated, it only made it worse, it made my whole guild Disconnect and they held that grudge for weeks against me! If we didn’t Disconnect, it might’ve been useful, but seriously it’s pretty much a useless skill…

It’s been so long since it activated I barely remembered the commands to stop them! I swear, even if I’m a god now, I was still a human a day or two ago, so please exempt me from murder…

The most surprising part was after I almost killed them, they apologized! I was seriously thinking EHHHHH on the inside. To compensate them, I did decide to tell them about what I knew about the goddess, but then I decided to make an exchange. If they help me find a way to eat, I’ll tell them all I know and I’ll help them try to find her, yup, that was my decision. I mean, how hard is it to find a way to eat right? They just got to find a surgeon right? How hard can it possibly be, with magic, I bet surgery is even easier in this world, yup.

If you spot this story on Amazon, know that it has been stolen. Report the violation.

As for the rude sword and shield guy who tried to attack me a SECOND time, they called Haruto, personally I don’t hate him. He’s willing to lose his life for the goddess, so he must love her a lot. Although I don’t understand, I respect that, so I used [Warrior’s Scale] oh him, which is a skill that gives a person a blessing to summon either [Holy Aegis] or [Malice], which uses 1% mana a second, but if they don’t use both weapons the equal amount of time, they’ll suffer 70% weakened stats for 3 days…

It is a decent blessing, since both skills are legendary rank, but since players can’t change equipment in the middle of battle… it’s kind of useless…

Well, I hope that logic doesn’t apply in this world

Or it’ll probably help out in emergencies, just like that summoning crystal I binded to myself, they can summon me in a pinch.

Still why did they thank me after I warned them not to mention about me? I mean all I wanted was so the world doesn’t know I am strong, since with power comes responsibility, and I hate that crap.

…

So…. What now…

…..

.

I hope they get in a pinch soon… I’m still stuck here…

---
“Sire! Greed is resonating!”

“WHAT! Do you mean to tell me the 7th artifact has appeared?”

“Yes.”

“I see… the peace was nice while it lasted, *Sigh* war will be upon us soon, ready the troops.”

“What about the Byosus?”

“Their newborns without a capital, don’t mind them, we just have to find Gluttony before the others.”

“Yes sir!”

As the second figure left the room, “*Sigh* I knew this day would come, and at the worst time possible… goddess-sama, I hope you predicted this and left insurance, or else races will go extinct... for good…”

---

IT’S BEEN A FRIGGING MONTH!!!! WHYYYY AM I STILL STUCK HERE!!!!!

I’M SO FRIGGING BORED, THAT I’VE BEEN PLAYING ROCK PAPER SCISSORS WITH MYSELF!

*Sigh*

At least I don’t need to eat or go to the washroom, or I’d be seriously screwed…

…

Actually, even dying would be better than this… I’d just respawn at the bottom of the dungeon according to Daeneries …

WHY DIDN’T I THINK OF THAT SOONER!

Well… he’s been right so far about high god… but I’m still not sure about this…

I mean if he lied, I’d be really dead and I don’t mean it figuratively…

*Sigh* what do I do now…

As Yuiitsu and Sei was seriously bored out of their minds for who know how many times, a blue circle appeared in front of them.

“”ALL RIGHT! THEY’RE IN TROUBLE!””

Without thinking, the twins jumped right in,

---

Finally I’m out! I’m no longer locked up in that place!

As the twins fully appeared, countless silver chains appeared from every direction in the surrounding and firmed bounded them

The chains were so tightly packed, it made them look like a mummy wrapped in chains.

Oh COME ONE! I JUST GOT OUT!

Looking around, searching for the person who bound them up. In the grassland surrounded by stone walls, they saw a single boy wearing a uniform about 11, standing in front of a magic summoning circle, which they are on right now, and behind the boy stood a single old man in robes, with around 19 other children beside him…

WHERE THE HELL AM I THIS TIME AND WHO ARE THESE PEOPLE!?

chapters.name: Chapter 7: Deal
chapters.content:
If you want to know why this took so long, I blame school! frigging 2 assignments and 1 test on monday, god... the agony...

BTW MORE TEST AND EXAMS INC! YAY!!!!! .... I hate life sometimes...

so yea if release slows, you know why @>@

PS this chapter was rushed, if you found some errors please tell me in comment below, or if you're confused about anything. Please and thank you :D

---

Chapter 7: Deal

Ok… I stepped into a magic circle for summoning, that I’m sure, this means I was summoned? I guess that boy crouching near the circle is my summoner?

Suddenly, the space beside the boy is starting to distort. A small white sphere appeared, and it slowly expanded outwards into an oval the size of an adult.

From the white hole, an angry old man in a long robe appeared and he’s staring at me? Hey don’t you know it’s not polite to stare!

So, what am I supposed to say in this situation… It’s not every day you get summoned and bounded in chains for no reason at all…

What the hell do I do…

“Excuse me, but may I ask why you two have graced us with your presence?”

Wow, that old man is polite, unlike the boy who has this stupid smirk on his face. Why is he looking at me like that!?

“I summoned them, so now they’re my servants.”

Servant? Why the hell would I serve a brat!?

“Ho? And pray tell how you managed to summon them?”

“Obviously because I’m talented!”

“…”

“”…””

The boy might be stupid or retarded… probably retarded…

“*Sigh* leaving that aside, why are the two of you here?”

“”We were summoned.”” Can’t really deny that fact though, but it makes me feel stupid being summoned by such an idiot.

“So what are your plans now?”

Actually, what are my plans!? At first I wanted to be just a neet and play, eat sleep, but now I don’t need sleep, can’t eat and there’s nothing to play, I have nothing to do… Oh right I still got to test whether I truly can’t eat or not.

“”We want to test something.””

Ehhh, the old man got more tense, and he sent the teacher and children away? What does he think I want to test? Genocide? Geez, people really lack common sense here…

“And what do you want to test…”

“”Eating bread.””

“What…”

What’s wrong with eating bread!? Why’s he staring at me as if I’m an idiot! Hey that’s insulting! Don’t look at me the same way you looked at the retarded brat! Maybe they don’t have bread as food? That makes more sense.

“”How about rice?””

“Wait, wait, you lost me… you want to try eating food?”

“”Yea, is there a problem?””

What other purpose is there for bread? Oh right, I remember in history class, they said in medieval times, bread was used as a plate?

“Excuse me, but I don’t understand, why’re you so tense? You are the headmaster right? You should be at Grandmaster S rank, and don’t you see they’re bounded in chains, they can’t possibly be a threat.”

Oh S rank? I remember in the game once reaching the S rank, instead of +,- they use a new ranking system, since the gap between the ranks are so high. Every rank above S rank is divided into Novice, Veteran, Expert, Master, Grandmaster, Saint, King, Emperor, Divine, God. Once, they reach the S god rank, they'll reach a bottleneck, and to go into the next tier, they got to evolve their race. For instance, the bottleneck of the human race is A rank, they need to evolve into demigod to get into S rank. And to reach low god, they need to be SS rank and then max of SS rank is when they can evolve to mid god.

The difference between a human and a demigod, beside their strength, is just that a demigod can live 10x longer than a human… Wow he must be old!

The old man was talking to the boy, but he was still staring at me. Crap, did he sense me calling him old in my mind! Oh wait, he’s just being vigilant…

“Understand this boy, I set up a spell, one that warns me in anything above S rank entered the academy grounds, and the ones that set it off are standing in front of you, I’m not sure why they haven’t broken out of the chains yet, but I doubt a chain made by a measly D rank child can keep it contained.”

With that, the boy’s facial expression changed. It was not one of fear or terror, but instead excitement.

“Yes! I summoned an above S ranked being as my servant!”

I thought I told him I’m not his servant! Forget the food, this guy’s ticking me off!

“”Why do we have to be your servant?””

“Ehhhh? What are you talking about?”

“”we’ll repeat what we said. We    are    not    your    servants.””

“But, I summoned you two.”

I swear I’m going to beat them so badly, they won’t consider asking me to be their servant again!

Right as I was about to break the chains and have some quality… Teacher time…

“And how could someone barely even ranked D, summon an being above S rank?”

“um… I’m talented?”

“Out with it brat!”

“Um… yes, I used an S ranked beast’s magic crystal to help strengthen the summoning.”

“And where did you get that magic crystal…”

Hahaha! Serves you right brat! Since I got nothing better to do, watching someone, besides me, get scolded is so much fun.

With a meek and scared expression, the child replied to the headmaster who was so angry, I could literally see a vein pop on his forehead. Rest in pieces, I’ll forever remember you as that annoying brat.

“I got it from the treasury sir…”

“And which treasury is that!”

The narrative has been taken without permission. Report any sightings.

“The one in the basement…”

“HOW DID YOU EVEN GET IN THE BASEMENT!”

“Through the front door?”

“BUT THAT’S LOCKED WITH AN A RANK SPELL! HOW DID YOU GET THROUGH IT!?”

“Internet?”

“WHAT THE HELL IS AN INTERNET!?”

It seems the headmaster truly didn’t know about internet and considering the technology I have seen so far, I doubt they have it, so why does the boy know about it?

I quickly broke out of the chains using [Ailment Destruction], which destroys spells that continuously cause aliment, and walk towards them both, which left their mouths gaping open seeing how easy I broke out of it. Normally, I’d take this time to enjoy the view, but there’s more pressing matter at hand.

“”Japanese?””

“EHHHHHH! How do you know about Japan?”

I see, he truly was either a person that travelled to this world, or reincarnated…

“”Date?””

“You mean the current date? I think…”

“”No, earth””

With that, his eyes nearly popped out of his eye sockets, before finally calming down and thinking about it.

“Um, 2018?”

That was 12 years ago! And with his age, it perfectly fits… Does that mean he reincarnated here 12 years ago? Did the goddess send him here too… I wonder what’s his purpose.

“”Who sent you?””

“Eh!? What do you mean?”

Weird… that reaction means he wasn’t sent by anyone, then how did he get here…

…

This is interesting!

“”Old man, let us enroll here.””

“EH!? Why?”

“”Because!””

I need to research how to change my gender, eat as well as magic, well the magic is just to complete the first two tasks. Oh and there’s also school, I kind of missed that too. I dropped out in high school to support myself, but the times there were fun. Hanging out, eating, playing around, it was fun… It seems, only when you lose it, do you miss it…

Well I can’t really tell him that, since the whole another world crap sounds crazy…

Wait… Why do I have to make an excuse in the first place?

“”Why not?””

Oh crud, I think I pissed him off… was it something I said, because his eyes literally looked at me the same way he looked at the boy earlier…

“I don’t know, BECAUSE YOU CAN POSSIBLY KILL EVERYONE THERE, DESTROY THE PLACE AND DO MUCH MORE WITH ALL THAT POWER IN YOUR BODIES!? Hell I don’t even know what you are!”

I took out a magical contract item from the game. It was used for non-aggression pacts between two parties and if one violates it, they will lose whatever is written on it, but I’m not sure if it works in this world… Why not test it out?

Handing the paper to him with an innocent smile, I asked,

“”Contract?””

Which made his jaws drop again… seriously, why’s he so surprised about a non-aggression pact… I swear they were easily made, only C rank items.

“This! This is a magical contract guarded by the world system! How did you get your hands on it!?”

What…

Magical contract guarded by the world system!? Well the world did enforce it, so I guess that makes sense, but whys he so surprised if he knew about it?

“Only the ancient mystical races in the past used these to settle disputes! The method to create them was thought to be long gone! How did you get one!”

… I’m not going to say anything, nope! If I talk about the game, it’ll only make me seem crazy…

What do I say… ahhh forget it, sorry Mariko, I’m stealing your favorite line

Acting as cutely as possible with my tilted head and a finger on my cheek I tell him,

“”Se-c-ret””

And his face blushed! I saw that! Even it’s disgusting seeing it on an old man, Mariko’s favorite line worked, but god it’s so embarrassing doing it I feel like I could die…

“Ahem, Fine, I’ll go fill out a transfer sheet… But you two still have to take a test to find out which class you two are in, promise not to do anything that can cause harm to the students or teachers here while you’re here as well as help the academy in case there’s trouble.”

Not like any of those are a problem, since I do have common sense you know, I’m not going to blow up everyone in the academy, just for fun. And if there’s trouble I guess helping out is okay, since I’ll be staying here. The main problem is… the test… I swear I never did like taking tests and I never will, but this is necessary to find my class, so I’ll bear with it…

Wait, he didn’t say the consequence for going against the set of rules! Haha, that means there are none!

“”Deal.””

Oh crap, I forgot to ask for a place to stay… Oh well, I’ll just sneak into the headmaster’s house, not like he can do anything about it MWAHAHAHA

With the magical contract made, he teleported away, to deal with the transfer papers I think? Well, this is nice, a place to stay, playing with friends and learning magic to find a way to regain my gender and my FOOOOOOOD!!!!

“So, are you two going to be my servant now?”

GOD DAMMIT WHY DO YOU HAVE TO RUIN MY HAPPY TIME!

Turning to the annoying brat… wait… I didn’t even know his name!

Ah forget it, it’s not important

And with that I left him and started my tour around the campus!

“Wait, I haven’t heard your answer yet!”

GOD DAMMIT CAN’T YOU TAKE A HINT! I swear if I’m not the type of guy that keeps his promises, I’d beat you black and blue right now!

And with that, I ran, from the annoying brat whose name I don’t even know.

chapters.name: Chapter 8: Zeff
chapters.content:
OK this ones actually a bit boring gomenasai

Chapter 8: Zeff

As I was lying on two branches that is in some garden on the academy under the warm afternoon sun, the space distorted again and from the distortion, the headmaster walked out with a calm and determined face. The white hair, white beard and the wrinkles on his face, however, makes him seem a bit tired.

I have no idea what he’s determined about, but I hope it’s not troublesome to deal with, I’d rather not have to do anything, I’m lazy.

“Can you two explain to me why you’re lying on a tree branch over 5 meters above the ground?”

What should I tell him… The truth about running away from that annoying stalker brat, and then climbing to the top of the tree to hide from him?

Nope totally not saying that, it’d make me feel even more stupid. I’m just going to do what I do every time I don’t know what to say, MAKE AN EXCUSE! It worked in middle school, so why not here.

““Ummmm, because it’s nice here?””

“*Sigh* forget it, I’ve filled out the transfer sheet, now all we need is for you to take the test.”

I don’t think he bought it... ah whatever, let’s just pretend nothing happened and go with the flow…

I tried to get up from the tree, “”Let’s go now then.””

But I was stopped by the headmaster who raised his hand telling me to stop,

“The test won’t be ready for a bit, since they’re making it now, so while we’re waiting, can you two answer some questions?”

“”Why not””

“What are the two of you. From Identify, I can’t see.”

“”Not telling””

“How about your race?”

“”Nope””

“Your class?”

“”No””

“*Sigh* How about the ACTUAL reason for your stay here, since you can test ‘eating bread’ anywhere. Why here?”

“”Learning Magic””

And testing eating too, but I don’t think he’ll like that answer…

“Oh? So you two are one of those ancient beings that don’t bother with worldly matters and only seek knowledge?”

Wow there are beings like that?

I wonder what they look like and where they are. Maybe I can go find some of them to help with my research. Yes, yes I’ll gather an army of ancient wise old men to help me search for a way to eat food! And then, I’ll make them research a way to create the tastiest food with magic! My plan is brilliant if I do say so myself.

“So that’s what you two are, since you’re nodding your head. And as long as this academy has value, you’ll stay and protect it right? I’ve met a few of your kind in my lifetime and they’re all like that.”

“”No wait we’re…””

Interrupting my denial with a big grin on his face as if he just solved the biggest mystery in the world, the headmaster happily announced,

“Worry not, I will not tell anybody about you two. I know your kind are very secretive, but I’m still a bit curious, why you’re not hiding your status and how you two are able to speak at the same time with the same words.”

His words seriously surprised me, well it was pretty obvious that if you met two people who are able to speak the same thing at the same time, it’d be pretty weird. I feel even stupider for not noticing this a while ago… Why didn’t anybody tell me!

I guess I should stop this for when the school starts.

Let’s let Yuiitsu be the quiet one and Sei be the one doing all the talking.

As for the closed eyes… nothing I can do about that, since they are one use per week and I doubt eyes with a scale symbol in it is normal… I probably have to figure something out before the school starts, or bullshit my way through it…

Let’s see, what else stands out. The wings are retractable, and the equipment can be unequipped. I guess that leaves me only with the closed eyes,

“Are you two okay?”

“Ah, sorry I was thinking of something.”

“Huh, why isn’t the black lady talking?”

“Well, we just had a discussion and the two of us speaking in sync would be weird, so I’ll be the one doing the talking from now on. As for how we’re able to do it, great minds think alike?”

“Haha, so you don’t want to tell me huh? It’s fine, I was just curious, also why don’t you two hide your status? Is it to deter unwanted people from bothering you two, or some other reason?”

“What? What do you mean hide my status?”

“Oho, so you two didn’t know you can hide your status?”

I shook my head, because I had no idea what he was talking about.

“You see, there’s a skill called [Identify], it allows one to tell the status of the person the use it on, and to counter it, people use a skill to either create a fake status for them to see, or just block it.”

This book was originally published on Royal Road. Check it out there for the real experience.

“I never knew that…”

“Don’t worry I’ll teach you, since you’re going to need it if you want to stay in school here.”

“Before you do, can you tell me why did your attitude change so much? At the start you were on guard and cautious around me, but now you’re so open it’s scary.”

With a smirk as if he won something, the old man happily replied

“Haha, I picked up a few tricks in my days. And one of them lets me tell what people are like from conversing with them. And your answers contained no lies, only honesty. Not only that, but also the actions you conducted yesterday also led to no casualty as well as no one being hurt, since if you two wanted to do something to the academy, I doubt I can stop you two because both your stats are question marks to me. Your people also have… unique knowledge, so you can consider this an investment, maybe I can get something out of it in the future.”

He seems like a good guy, but I’ll still keep my real identity a secret for now, since he might react differently if he knew the truth.

“Thank you, Mr…”

“Call me Zeff, Zeff Theofrius”

“Nice to meet you Zeff, I’m Sei and this is Yuiitsu. Also, Did you know if you don’t set a punishment when you sign the Contract, it automatically invalidates itself, since there’s no consequence of violating the deal?”

“So you mean…”

“Yes, you made me waste a contract, by not stating any punishment and I’m still able to harm the people here if I choose to.”

“I see, so why did you tell me this?”

“Let’s say, it’s the first return from your investment”

“Haha, I guess I can trust you two. Now about hiding your status, you need to open up your own status, before covering it in another layer of mana. Then change the mana into either a barrier to protect people from reading your status, or manipulating the information on it. Usually it takes a few months to learn, but one as powerful as you shouldn’t take too long.”

…What the fuck…

Covering my status in a layer of mana? I don’t know how to manipulate mana! Every time I cast a spell I just think of what the spell does and recite the spell words in my head and BAM it appears.

…

Okay, let’s try once before asking Zeff…

As I was imagining a slimy liquid that dripped down from above, slowly covering my status screen in a blue goo, I felt the same sensation of when I use a skill in game and mana decrease.

I think that’s right? Now manipulate it to the values I want.

…

How do I do that?

Let’s just think of a bunch of 0s everywhere…

[Fake Status(F)] Acquired.

F class!? That low? Wow I must suck at this.

“Marvelous, you learned it in a matter of minut…”

“Huh?”

“…”

As I was pondering why he suddenly stop talking, I look up to see Zeff standing there looking at me with a troubled face.

“What”

“I don’t think that’s right…”

Status

00000 0000000 000 000
00000 0000 000

000000 0000
0000 0000000 000

00000 000
…

Yea that doesn’t seem right.

“Both of your status are messed up…”

Oh crap! I have a single status for the two of us. Meaning there’s no way to create a fake status, since we’ll have the same one…

God dammit, I guess I’ll just turn it into a barrier that blocks instead of altering the content seen.

Stuffing a third of all my mana into the barrier,

[Status Barrier(S)] Acquired.

“Ho? It’s now totally blocking me out.”

“Yea, changing it indicating growth is too troublesome, so I’ll just block out people trying to view it.”

“But how did you achieve such a high rank in the skill? Normally people start at a low rank, but your rank in the barrier is so high, it blocks me out completely!”

“Ughhhh I’m good at barriers?”

“Is it related to your class?”

Making a pouting face to try to change the topic

“Not telling.”

“Hoho, I guess I should stop trying to dig further huh? Well then, the test should be ready, so let’s go.”

With that, the space distorted again and following the headmaster, I also walked in.

…

YOU GOT TO BE KIDDING ME! THIS IS THE TEST!?
