chapters.name: Chapter 9: Outsider
chapters.content:
You see, the last chapter 9 was so good, that i was going to name this one chapter 10, but then again... I might get complaints about people wanting to see chapter 9 so scratch that @>@

Also I feel like the warning isn't doing its job... Maybe i should fire it and get a better one...

So without further Ado, Chapter 10! I mean 9!

---

Chapter 9: Outsiders

After following the headmaster into the portal, he brought me to a room. It was an empty classroom where the rows were set semicircular and each row was a bit higher than the row before.

It looked just like a university lecture halls you see on television.

“Here’s the paper and pencil, go sit anywhere and tell me when you’re done. I’m going to exclude you from the magic and physical combat section because I don’t want my academy to have holes in it…”

Hey! That’s insulting, I’m not like those brawns for brains idiots who doesn’t know how to control their power!

I took the paper and pencil while pouting, which brought a smile to Zeff’s face

“If I didn’t know any better, I would have thought you were a mere child.”

“Things aren’t always what they seem.”

“Haha, that’s true.”

Well, let’s get this over with.

“Oh and split up, don’t want you two cheating now.”

Oh right, as I split the two off into different directions, from Yuiitsu, I felt a gaze…

It came from the window, but as I turned to the source, it disappeared?

Opening my eyes, I tried to find any movement, while making sure the headmaster did not see them, but there was none

“Is something wrong? Why did you two both turn to the window?”

“Ah no it’s nothing.”

I guess I’ll worry about that later, someone was probably just curious and looked through the window, while leaving right after.

Looking over the test…

…

This is stupid…

…

What kind of person put history on the test! HOW THE HELL AM I SUPPOSE TO KNOW WHEN THIS STUPID KINGDOM WAS CREATED!

And what the hell is the Dark Era!

The math was easy as hell, and magic theory was mostly about how elements react to each other, which is common chemistry, but how do I deal with history!

There’s also a stupid section about etiquette! Who cares about that!?

Sure you don’t want to be disgusting in public, but who cares about walking in a straight line with back straight and all that crap. Just walk god dammit! How do I answer these!?

Screw it, I’ll just leave it blank…

“What’s wrong? Is it too hard?”

“Huh, oh no. I’m done.”

“Already!? It’s only been a few minutes!”

“Well, most of it is blank, so that’s why.”

The surprised look on his face made me feel good, but I really did leave most of the test blank, since they had some really stupid subjects on there.

“Well, we’ll grade it today and you can start class tomorrow. Here’s your keys, they’re for room 248 in the residents building. This academy is set up with the main academy in the center, the north-east building for residents and cafeteria, the north-west building for magic studies, and the physical activities building in the south. The academy is surrounded by a barrier in the Forest of Draggres, so be careful. Actually I doubt the monsters here are more fearsome than you, but don’t go breaking the barrier, it cost a lot of mana to repair.”

“Thanks”

As I took the keys from the grinning old man, I once more felt the gaze…

*Sigh* Since they’re only watching I guess it’s okay, but if they don’t stop soon, I’m give them a piece of my mind.

After I left the room, the gaze was gone and I got a free place to stay at WOOHOO! But I forgot something important.

Really important…

Which way is north!? And which building are we in right now?

…

I really want to try to eat something! The joys of good food cannot be matched! Then again, it’s back to cafeteria food again… *Sigh* Those suck!

Maybe I should ask someone for directions…

Ah screw it, I’ll just walk around, there should only be 4 buildings, how hard can it be.

---

As Yuiitsu and Sei left the hallway, an owl appeared from shadows in the room, and seeing it, the old headmaster grinned even more.

“So what do you think?”

“About what?”

“Don’t play dumb, you and me both know what we’re talking about.”

“The twins huh.”

“What else could it be about.”

“Nothing.”

“So what’s your first impression.”

“…They do not care.”

Hearing these unexpected words, the headmaster’s grin instantly disappeared and he stared at the owl expectantly,

“What does that mean?”

“It means as I have said, they do not care, not about life, death, the world, nothing.”

“Really? It seems to me they were good children, that are kind.”

“They act the part, but their eyes shows the truth, they have long lost interest in the world…”

This story has been unlawfully obtained without the author's consent. Report any appearances on Amazon.

“Hmm, maybe your right, but how do you know which world they lost interest in?”

“What do you mean…”

The owl’s eyes instantly turned sharp and glared at the headmaster, but he just revealed smirk and threw papers at the owl.

“This… this is…”

“Yes it’s their test…”

“…Did they do this on purpose… Or are they outsiders… What are they truly…”

“Possibly, but we don’t know that, now do we.”

“…”

“Either they purposely left it blank, or they know nothing about this world’s history, not about the Dark Era, Outsider’s invasion, nothing. As well as elemental theories and symbols that this world hasn’t even heard of yet. It’s highly likely that they’re outsiders…”

“…So it has started again… With the goddess asleep, this will be a tough battle…”

“Haha, or they could not.”

Hearing these words, the owl’s gaze instantly sharpened as he directed it to the headmaster.

“What do you mean…”

“As you have said, their eye’s shows lack of emotions correct?”

“…”

“When they were summoned, they also did not cause any harm, damage or even act up, and they didn’t try to hide any info, but instead revealed some, such as the World Contract.”

“So you mean…”

“It is possible they are deserters, and from them we can get useful intel.”

“I see, but it’ll be dangerous…”

“? Aren’t you six strongest dragon Grandielf? The one that repelled over 10,000 outsiders by himself?”

“Yes, but their Status Barrier… It is at least S class… I was blocked out, so I don’t know their strength. And we all know how dangerous that can be, not knowing the strength of the opposition…”

Hearing this, the headmaster’s eyes instantly widened in surprise.

“What do you mean! I just taught them that barrier a few minutes ago, they couldn’t possibly have made it past S class!”

“Ho… Then that means you should’ve seen their status right? Then I guess it won’t be as dangerous as I thought.”

“… Not exactly…”

“!? What do you mean”

“I couldn’t see anything… everything was question marks meaning, they’re much stronger than me…”

“…I guess they’re even more dangerous than I thought…”

“But I have a feeling, they’re not dangerous people, if not opposed, they will not act.”

“Hmph, and I feel they’re dangerous beyond compare, they almost noticed me twice, and I was in perfect stealth.”

“Then I guess, I’ll just leave the watching over them, to you, since you consider them dangerous.”

“Huh!? What’re you going to do then?”

“Nothing unless I have to do something.”

“Easy going as always…”

“Yup.”

“*Sigh* How did you even make it to S class with that attitude, normally your kind is the first to perish.”

“I trusted my instinct and they’ve never failed me yet.”

“I guess that’s true… If not for your instinct, I guess I wouldn’t be here right now…”

“You mean as my pet or among the living?”

“As much as I hate to say it… Both…”

“Haha, I guess that’s true.”

“So what’re you going to do about them?”

“As I have said, nothing, my instincts are telling me not to go against them, but instead follow and support them. They feel like a natural disaster, one you cannot avoid, but if you follow its tracks, not only will you avoid it’s wrath, you’ll also reap it’s benefits.”

“*Sigh* And what if they still cause harm, even if you don’t go against them?”

“That’s where you come in.”

“*Sigh* Same crap as always…”

“Haha, don’t be like that old chap, it’ll be fine, and also warn the dragons… Trouble’s brewing… I can feel it and with the goddess gone… It might be serious, so stay on alert.”

“Understood.”

And with that the owl disappeared into the shadow once more, leaving the headmaster Zeff Theofrius there with a difficult expression on his face.

“Old chap… As always, you miss important details.”

In his hand, he held the two set of tests…

Both identical to one another…

“They can speak in sync, answer the same questions with the same answers and leave the same questions blank. Even the name is not their own, but together Yuiitsu and Sei. There wasn’t even a sign of any magic being used like thought transmission. If they are the scouts for the Outsiders, then we’re doomed, but if we can get them on our side... Then we might get some nice intel and new knowledge. Even if there was no Outsider invasion, then we’d have lost nothing.”

“…But I hope, I’m wrong… I truly hope, this feeling that tells me, you two are natural disasters that crush all within its wake is wrong… and the one telling me your kind is right…”
“No, now’s not the time to worry about whether I’m right or wrong. For now I just have to try to bring them to our side…”

chapters.name: Chapter 10: Night
chapters.content:
Chapter 10: Night

(Grandielf)

I’m sorry Zeff, but I hope you’ll forgive me for going against you this once…

Those eyes…

They aren’t from this world for sure. There are no eyes in this world with a scale in it, and when I saw it… I felt like they could see through everything. Within those eyes, I could also sense an unmeasurable power hidden underneath, one that I’m sure is extremely powerful.

And even though I was in perfect stealth, those eyes makes me question whether they noticed me or not, but one thing is for sure. They knew they were being watched and yet they did not take any action…

…

They are arrogant...

I probably have only one chance to destroy them. Even if I die, I’ll have to convince the Five Elders to use that orb to summon Daeneries, because they are that dangerous…

---

(Hallway inside the main academy building)

*Sigh* I’ve been wandering around this stupid building for a while, but I still can’t find the god dam door out!

The sky’s already dark, so the cafeteria should be closed by now…

*Sigh*

“You two over there, Stop!”

Huh?

As I turned around, I saw a little girl wearing a blazer and skirt around 14 walking towards me with a rapier drawn.

Wait…

Is that a rapier!?

Are weapons allowed in this academy?

“HEY! I’m talking to you!”

“Ah, I’m sorry, I was thinking of something. May I ask what you want?”

“Humph, demon scum. Get out of the academy or I’ll kill you here and now!”

Isn’t this person jumping to conclusions too easily?

And isn’t that punishment a little harsh to demons?

“I’m not a demon you know.”

“Hmph, you might not be a demon, but you hang out with one, so it doesn’t make you any better!”

I hang out with one?

…

Does she mean Yuiitsu?

Looking towards Yuiitsu, I just see a pretty human girl. There’s no part of her that makes her look like a demon?

Then again, I don’t even know what demons look like in this world.

“Why is my friend considered a demon?”

“Humph, don’t act dumb with me, everyone knows demons have black hair with red eyes and although both of you have your eyes closed, her hair’s black. This means she must be a demon pretending to be human!”

“Can’t humans have black hair?”

“Only humans that learn black magic and its considered illegal in the human kingdom, when found its instant death sentence!”

So she’ll see me as either a criminal or demon huh? And if I pick either one, she’ll kill me…

*Sigh* so troublesome

“She’s not a demon, she’s my twin sister. She was cursed and now her hair is black.”

“… Show me your eyes, if it’s not red, I’ll believe you…”

…

Should I…

As I opened my eyes with Yuiitsu, I used Sei to quickly explain.

“She can’t talk because of the curse, and as you can see from her eyes, something was done to her.”

After seeing Yuiitsu’s eyes, the girl just stood there with a shocked face and stared in silence.

Although I had a straight face, on the inside, I was screaming please believe my lie!

I seriously have no other ideas at this moment. The only other idea was finding the headmaster, and asking him to make some lie up, but I can’t find a way out of this building, much less find the headmaster.

Then again, there’s the option of killing her, but that’s not going to help disguise Yuiitsu’s hair in the future and the headmaster’s promise…

Wait, I can also knock her out! That also works.

“Seeing as how you two look so similar, your different hair colours, as well as her eyes, I’ll believe she’s not a demon. But how do I know she didn’t become like that after learning dark magic?”

Dammit, she’s sharp…

Sorry, please don’t blame me for this,

And right when I used [Speed] to increase my movement speed,

The headmaster teleported in from the side of the wall,

“I thought I specifically said, no magic in the hal…”

And when he saw me, his face instantly cramped,

“Hello”

“What… What’re you doing here?”

“Uh… I kind of, might of gotten a bit lost…”

This book's true home is on another platform. Check it out there for the real experience.I feel so embarrassed right now I could literally feel my face turning red… I haven’t gotten lost since elementary school!

Seeing my reaction, the headmaster was also a bit stunned

“Right, probably should’ve told you, the only entrance and exits are on the second floor.”

…

What…

What kind of building only has entrances on the second floor!

Why don’t you guys put any on the first floor!?

Do you know how embarrassing it feels to admit a mistake like this in front of others!

I could literally feel my anger boiling and my face turning red, not from shame this time, but rage!

I wasted around an hour god dammit!

“Headmaster, you know them?”

“Huh? Oh if it isn’t Miss Zeifrei, on your daily after hour patrols I see.”

“Yes sir, and I found these suspicious individuals on the school grounds, and that one over there seems to be a dark mage.”

“Dark mage?”

As the headmaster turned around to look at us, he suddenly had a realization.

“Ah! Miss Zeifrei, she is not a dark mage!”

“Oh? So she truly was cursed? Then what are they doing here after hours if not coming to find live sacrifices for her dark magic?”

…

Dark magic sacrifice people?

Are we talking about the same dark magic here? The dark spells I have don’t need any live sacrifices.

“She’s here because she got lost, she’s going to be a new transfer student starting tomorrow, so please take care of her.”

“I see… Then I guess it’s fine, but she’ll still be punished for using magic on the school grounds without permission.”

“Ah, I forgot to tell her the rules, so please overlook this once Miss Zeifrei.”

“*Sigh* Yes, sir.”

And with that, she walked away, but not before giving me one last hateful glare.

Hey! What did I do!?

Turning my face away from her leaving back, I could see Zeff seriously looking at me.

“So why were you going to use magic…”

“…I was going to knock her out before running away…”

“…”

“What?”

“What would you do after knocking the king’s royal guard captain’s daughter out?”

“Runaway of course.”

“…”

What do you expect me to do? Stand there and wait to be punished? Some people these days are so stupid.

“Are you sure you’re not a child?”

“Are you sure you’re not an idiot?”

“Haha”

“Humph”

“Coming from the one that got lost?”

“…your childish…”

“HAHA! Well, since there’s nothing else you need, I’ll be taking my leave.”

As I leave the building, I saw the girl called Zeifrei standing outside the door by the wall,

When she saw me, she instantly pulled out her rapier again and pointed it at me.

“What are you two?”

Huh!?

“What do you mean”

“Don’t try to act dumb with me” and suddenly she leaped pointing the rapier’s tip towards Yuiitsu’s throat,

As she was just about to hit Yuiitsu’s throat, I used Sei to pull Yuiitsu out of the way and seeing my movement, she suddenly slashed sideways with even more force than before, but I already jumped down the stairs and started to walk away.

There’re times when you should fight and there are times you should run and since I shouldn’t hurt the students, this time should run, but if I’m going to run, I want to at least look cool while doing it.

I mean seriously, running away look cowardly, but walking away slowly looks cool!

Seeing me walk away, she started to run at me with the rapier

“GET BACK HERE!”

NOPE! RUN! SCREW LOOKING COOL!

“**** JUST WAIT TILL I CATCH YOU TWO!”

WHY WOULD I WAIT IDIOT!

---

Hiding in a flower bed, no one will suspect a thing!

After around an hour, I slowly got up from the flower bed in the garden

“*Sigh* I hope I lost that annoying girl“

“Huh? Who are you?”

Eh?

Turning around, I saw a little boy with a scholar like look. He had snake like eyes, two black horns on his head, a full head of black hair that moves like water and pale white skin. On his back was a lizard tail and a pair of wings formed from the same material as his hair.

chapters.name: Chapter 11: Darkness
chapters.content:
:V

~.~ (。-ω-)zzz

----

Chapter 11: Darkness

The scholar looking boy was narrowing his eyes, while emitting killing intent at me. Combined with his looks I swear it feels like death itself is standing before me.

“I won’t repeat my question a third time, Who Are You?”

With that, the dark fluid started to gather around his two hands forming long sharp claws that seem to suck in all light. After the claws were formed, no longer did the black fluid move, but instead it hardened. After the claws, the same fluid started to cover his whole body, turning into a black set of armour that emit an aura of death.

At the same time, darkness starts to slowly rise all around the three of us, creating a space with just the three of us.

“My name is Sei and this is Yuiitsu.”

“And what are you two doing here?”

“We were chased here by that messed up girl? I mean seriously, who attacks a person they’ve never met with a rapier!”

“No I don’t mean in this garden.”

“Oh, I’m a new student here, nice to meet you.”

With a kind smile I seriously hope he doesn’t attack me. I mean weird black fluid + big dark claws = bad idea to mess with. I’d say that’s a pretty easy to understand equation.

“Enough of your jokes, I mean why’re you in this world?”

This world? I doubt he would like the joke about ‘When a man and woman are deeply in love with each other’…

“A goddess sent us here.”

“A goddess huh? Tell me, what is her name.” Slowly narrowing his eyes further, the boy got into fighting stance.

“Ughhhh, her name?”

“Yes, What Is Her Name?” Slowly saying one word at a time, I could feel the tension rising.

But in all honesty, I forgot. Or did she even tell her name to me? Wait a sec, did I even ask?

Wow, agreeing to the request of a random stranger without even knowing their name… I must be a genius…

“I don’t know?”

“And what did she send you two here to do?”

“She sent us here to guard the gate linking the two worlds at the bottom of the Dungeon of Origin.”

“And the two of you are all the way out here, in the middle of this academy becoming students instead of doing your job huh? If you’re going to tell a lie at least make it believable.”

After that, he immediately dashes at us,

“But it’s true!”

Without listening at all, he swipes his claws at both of us at once. I jumped back in order to avoid it, but just when I thought I avoided it, the claws shot off a black slash hitting both of our bodies at the same time knocking us back.

Slowly we got up from the ground, but the shadow guy did not follow up. He just stood there staring at us.

“…what…”

Watching us get up, I could clearly see his eyes getting wider and wider.

“What the hell are you two!?”

I’d like to say the same to you. What kind of creature has those type of wings and hair god dammit, I haven’t even heard of anything like him in light novels!

If you encounter this tale on Amazon, note that it's taken without the author's consent. Report it.

After I checked my health…

Seriously?

Only around 5%?

You know, I kind of expected better from a guy who looks like a mid or final boss type of character…

Just as I was about to take out my weapons from my inventory, I noticed something weird from the edge of my vision.

…

That did not happen in the game…

From Sei, white fluids oozed out of the slash across her body, and from Yuiitsu, black fluid oozed out instead of blood.

Looking at my status, there wasn’t any debuffs, so I had no idea what this thing was either and as I watched, the cut across the body started to close itself up.

Standing here isn’t going to get me anywhere, so

I decided to take advantage of the dazed enemy and quickly equipped the combat gear that I removed, which left him in a bigger daze.

“You… you two are angels!?”

Wait what?

“Those wings, the white wings of an angel and the black wings of a fallen, there’s no mistake.”

“Sorry, but we’re not angels or fallen, we’re balancers.”

“Wha?”

Guess there’re no balancers in this world? Weird, they were a pretty popular class in the game. The fire and water balancer which has one body fighting like a berserk, while the other healing him from behind. The earth and wind balancer, which has a strong tank with an fast archer supporting him. And lastly, the light and dark balancer, which has one negating attacks, while the other one has controlling abilities.

Although they were a popular class, people did suck playing them, since you had to control two bodies which takes skill. But those that master it are really strong, since they take two rolls with one character, but the stats are linked, so the player has to make either one strong and the other weak or both average. In the case where they make one strong and the other weak, the enemy can just focus on attacking the weak one, since the health and mana is linked.

Oh right, I’m no longer a balancer, now the job’s changed to something called a balance god? Wonder what new skills I get.

“fu, fua… It matters not what you are, all that matters is you aren’t supposed to be in this world, so either leave quietly, or we will be forced to kill you.”

“Why am I not supposed to be in this world though?”

“We the low and mid gods watch over the people, and a few days ago, the power of a being above S rank appeared in this world in a pillar of light. It did not match any of the beings we knew of, so of course we thought it was the new high god that appeared. I came here to find it, but before I could, it masked its own status and instead of finding one person, I found two. So don’t you think it’s time to drop the act Outsiders”

“Outsiders?”

“Yes, you”

“You?”

“No, YOU!”

“Me?”

“YES! ME!”

This is kind of fun…

“You?”
“UGHHHHHH enough talking! If you two won’t leave, I’ll force you!”

chapters.name: Chapter 12: Fight
chapters.content:
Sorry for being late.

I was lazy :V AND I STILL AM.Oh yea if anyone has something to say that might improve my novel please do, since I'm still a novice @>@

Basically HALP MEH!---

Chapter 12: Fight

The moment the man rush in, I took a stance. The one I always used in the game to test out my opponent’s level to find the best approach to deal with them.

I let Yuiitsu stand to the left while holding the black sword in her right hand facing towards the enemy, and holding the white sword in a reverse grip to the left side. At the same time, I let Sei stand on the right side holding the black sword in her left hand, while also holding the white sword in a reverse grip.

This is my usual stance for combat, since the white blade has a special effect on it called [Parry]. The ability is hard to use, but it mitigates damage up to 100% and deflect it, however, using it requires a lot of skill. I mean seriously, try to deflect a fireball flying at you at like 6000000000000km/h, ok not that fast, but it’s still hard. Even I haven’t mastered it yet, that’s how hard the ability is and, not to brag but, I was one of the most skilled players in the game! Ok maybe I was bragging, just a little… a litttttttleeeeee…

The ability itself is not a very rare ability, however it can only be found on weapons above epic rank, and since there’s so many players in the game, epics aren’t really epics anymore… They’re more like rares now?

Before equipments were separated into common, uncommon, rare, epic, legendary, ancient and origin, but due to the popularity of the game, there were so many players even ancient became common. Because of that, whoever the maker was decided to make an update and the drop rate decrease by the population size of the whole game.

Afterwards, the new weapons were a lot stronger than the old ones and special effects appeared in them, so everyone had to restart getting their equipment. It was funny watching one of my guild friends who got a weapon with parry in the past, he tried to parry everything everywhere and because he kept hitting his allies by accident, no one wanted to party with him after for weeks. One time in the middle of a boss run, he parried this [Unholy Spear] into the tanks, ummm, ‘LOWER AREA’ and of course the tank just had to have his pain setting on and man did he regret that. Everyone fell on the floor, one due to pain, others due to laughter. Of course we got whipped out, but it was worth it.

Breaking out of memory lane, I think the sudden change in stance must have surprised the man and made him think more carefully before rushing in because right away, he stopped his charge and started to go around us.

When he tried to get around, I make Yuiitsu turn over and stand back to back with Sei to ensure there are no blind spots.

I stood there ready to counterattack, but he just circled around me. Although he started off running pretty fast, either because he’s not a speed type character or he’s not high enough level, I can clearly see him circling me…

This looks cool in anime and all, but being in the middle of it… feels kind of stupid…

I mean all he’s doing is tiring himself out…

But the weird thing is, although I can see him clearly, why are there two of him now?

And just as I was confused about whether I’m hallucinating or he has a twin brother, another one arose from the shadows.

…

SHADOW CLONE!?

What the hell!? There’s no shadow clone skill in the game!?

But that’s going to be awesome if I can learn that!

Even though I do have the basic city teleportation skill that everyone has, I would still love to be able to be at multiple places at once.

Just think about it!

Having the taste of hamburgers, beef noodle soup, fries, pizza and a bunch of others in your mouth at the same time instead of going to each town eating them one after the other.

A case of literary theft: this tale is not rightfully on Amazon; if you see it, report the violation.

It’d either turn into a heavenly tasty or disgusting as hell, but I’d kind of want to try that.

Waking myself up from my trance, I noticed we were completely surrounded. The four of them stood in all four directions blocking us off, and as if that wasn’t bad enough, we were surrounded in a lack dome. It seems the darkness from rose from the grounds hardened creating an area just for us to fight. I didn’t even notice when it formed, since I could see in the dark, but this might be bad due to not knowing what effects this dome has.

The four of them slowly raised their claws at the same time and started to emit killing intent from all four directions. With the same looks, aura and actions, I really can’t tell which is the real body.

“”””I did warn you to leave quietly, but now, it’s too late.””””

Huh, so that’s what talking at the same time sounds like to others. It sounds kind of nice…

As I was debating whether to talk in sync or one after the other, the two shadowmen on the side made shadow spikes erupt from the ground flying towards them trying to split Yuiitsu and Sei apart.

However, I had other plans.

Making Yuiitsu leap forward, while Sei leaping back, I separated the single enemy from his group and since Sei’s specialization was in negation, she should be able to hold out long enough for Yuiitsu to test the enemy’s strength and weaknesses to figure out a fighting style.

Seeing my movement either infuriated them or surprised them greatly because all of a sudden they had a panicking look on their face.

As the three of them rushed at us, I had Sei stop and stand her ground.

Although I want to conserve as much mana as possible, I had to make sure Sei doesn’t die since the two bodies are linked, so I decided to use some of my higher end spells at the start.

The three enemy leaped at Sei, but I’m not sure if they’re using abilities or not since no one yells out the ability’s name unless they’re inexperienced with the skill and still need the chant words to activate it.

At the same time as the three enemy reached Sei, Yuiitsu seems to have reached the enemy. With clenched teeth and pure rage showing on his face, he was attacking with one claw across the body as well as the other going around to attack Yuiitsu’s back.

From the claw going around the back oozing out a dark aura, I can say for certain he activated some skill.

At the same time, the three engaging Sei also had a dark aura ooze out one of their claws. Not taking any chances, I decided to use [Demonic Extraction] and [Balanced Blow] combo.

The skill [Demonic Extraction] sucks in mana from the enemy using physical contact based on damage dealt, while [Balanced Blow] sends a shockwave outwards in every direction based on all the mana gained while it’s charging with a maximum of 5 second charge.

While I had Sei prepare to defend herself, I made sure Yuiitsu would deflect the claw going to her back with the white blade and attack the front claw head on with the black blade.

Seeing Yuiitsu’s movements, the man made a smirk on his face having full confidence in his abilities, but at the same time, so did I. Killing that giant golden RETARDED lizard must’ve given me some kind of power up, plus he probably couldn’t insta kill me since he already failed once and he got 2 hits on me at that time! One on each body at the same time! That kind of hit does 500% damage due to my jobs weakness!

As the two swords clashed with the two claws, something unexpected for both of us occurred.

“Eh?”
“”Huh?””

chapters.name: Chapter 13: Rip 'Ere-chan'
chapters.content:
It seems I'm getting worse at writing as the story goes on :X

Who knew ~.~----

Chapter 13: Rip ‘Ere-chan’

*Crack*

As the swords and claws were about to clash, the dark dome that surrounded us started to crack. And from the cracks, vines squirmed in slowly, wrapping around the dome and slowly crushing the dome to pieces.

I was thoroughly confused seeing the turn of event, but upon seeing the vines, the light in the man’s eyes seemed to shine and a big grin appeared on his face.

Turning his face back towards Yuiitsu, he slowly mouthed words for me to read.

‘You Lost’

Huh?

After mouthing those words, the claw that was about to meet my blade head on changed its target and instead went for my open chest. As the claw went for my chest, the darkness in it seems to have diminished and instead of pure black, it turned semi-transparent.

I was contemplating on what this meant, but with no time, I decided to continue my course of action. The black blade and the black claws will still collide mid-air due to the adjustments being made too late.

As the claw from the back was parried to the side, only causing a minor scratch on Yuiitsu’s arm, which was as predicted, however, when the black blade and black claws was about to clash, the black claw phased right through.

I could not help but let out a surprised noise seeing the unexpected situation.

“”Wha?””

The grin on smirk on the man’s face grew even wider seeing my predicament.

“Guard me!”

At the same time the word flew out of his mouth, the vine nearest to him expanded at an incredible pace, wrapping around his chest and a small diamond shape appeared from the tip of the vine. From the diamond’s four sides, silver petals expanded outwards in all direction.

Shimmering under the moonlight, a steel flower bloomed in front of my enemy, defending him.

However, unfortunately for me, I only had my equipment with a giant cut through it while he had a black armour and a metal flower set up as his defense.

To be honest, I kind of expected better from my equipment due to them being ancient rank, but since it doesn’t boost defense at all, I guess it makes sense.

As his claws once more cut diagonally across Yuiitsu’s body, my blade slashed across his. With a clank, the blade ripped through the armour and metallic flower.

When my blade cut through his defenses, leaving a giant gash across his body, he also let out a bewildered sound.

“!?”

Due to the force from the exchange, I was able to send him flying, but his blow did cleanly cut through Yuiitsu’s body.

From Yuiitsu’s wound, black fluid oozed out once more, but the body did not separate. Although I wasn’t able to cut him in half, my sword still did leave a large gash on his body and from it, blood spewed out nonstop.

Unlike last time where it barely hurt, this time it hurt like crazy! The pain was so bad I almost fainted, but if I faint now, I’ll be as good as dead. Using all of my strength to hold onto my consciousness, I make Sei quickly blow the enemies to pieces before jumping in front of Yuiitsu to defend her.

With a wounded body like that, I doubt I can move Yuiitsu much anymore.

*Sigh* I guess this is what I get for underestimating my opponent, thinking they’re just some weak mob…

“How…”

I tilt my head to the side because I seriously have no idea what he’s talking about.

“How did you cut through a Bastion flower and my armour made from a shadow dragon’s scale!”

Fufufu, I flexed up my arm showing the… um… muscle? On it.

“”We are strong!””

“With those weak skinny arms? What trick did you use!”

…

Thought I can’t really deny that… I did make this character based on cuteness, but as a man, it still hurts on the inside…

Even though I wouldn’t consider myself buff before, but

This tale has been pilfered from Royal Road. If found on Amazon, kindly file a report.

“Ara ara, Ere-chan, how many times did I tell you not to command my p…”

The voice was enchanting, it was the voice of a mature woman. Yet at the same time, the killing intent behind the words she said was frightening.

Looking towards the owner of the voice, I was stunned.

The woman had quite the tall figure and had a big bust. But that was not what stunned me. She wore a beautiful green dress that covered most of her body, long silky green hair cascaded down her back and her gorgeous face combined with her beautiful pink eyes made her look like a pink flower in a sea of grass.

I was literally standing there with my mouth wide open staring at her.

She looked towards the man I was fighting and instantly, the killing intent behind her voice disappeared with the wind.

*Sigh* “I guess it couldn’t be helped, seeing you took so much damage. Whelp, let’s go then.”

“Wait what!?”

“We’re leaving.”

“Why?”

“Quit questioning me, let’s go.”

With that, she grabbed ‘Ere-chan’’s arm and pulled him along, dragging him on the ground.

“AHHHHHHH!!!!”

“Quit whining like a little girl!”

…

I don’t think you should be doing that, the wound opening and more blood spewing out though… now I actually feel bad for him…

She turned around and smiled at me.

“Bye bye Yui-chan and Sei-chan, sorry for my little kouhai here causing trouble, we’ll take our leave now.”

With that, she flew away dragging the poor guy along…

…

You know at first I thought I’d like her as my girlfriend, but now… not so much…

While I was looking in the direction where the two left from, a voice called out from in front of Sei, the same place where the plant woman came from.

“Quite a shrewd one isn’t she.”

“”Eh, headmaster? Why are you here?””

“Why wouldn’t I be here after the huge mess you two caused?”

““Mess?””

“Look around you and tell me what you see.”

…

It’s a pretty flat land, with a stone road nearby?

“”land?””

“Yes land, and what was here before?”

Before? I think I was in a flower…

…

Oh…

“Remember now? *Sigh* Someone has to clean up the mess you guys made.”

Well technically it wasn’t my fault…

But if I say that now, I bet he’d snap. So yup, probably should hold it in…

With a snap of his fingers, the grass started to grow repopulating the barren land again. And after a while, flowers bloomed once more.

Wait…

It was that easy!?

I stared at the headmaster with a blank look on my face.

“What? You expect me to replant them one by one? I’m a very busy person you know.”

*Stare*

*Stare*

*Stare*

*Stare*

“Alright, alright, I’ll take you to your room.”

Wait, that’s not what I wanted! But it’s a good idea too since I have no idea where I am.

The headmaster started to walk towards a building, so I just followed behind him daydreaming.

Well, it’s night now, so I guess nightdreaming?

But seriously, that was a pretty exciting day, but it did help me realize,

Either sitting in the cave for a month has made me rusty, or I’m too careless…

Everything feels so real now, so it’s not the same as the game. Also, I can feel pain, not the little amount in the game, but real pain…

I better practice and more and stop relying on the fact that Daeneries told me I can’t die… I still haven’t confirmed it yet, and I don’t think I want to.

“”By the way headmaster.””

“Yes?”

“”Who were those two and why did they leave?””
“Ah, that was the mid God of Plants, Erashera and a new low god called Erexia, the God of Shadows.”

chapters.name: Chapter 14: Servant
chapters.content:
My apologies for being late, by 1-2 days >.

Unauthorized use: this story is on Amazon without permission from the author. Report any sightings.

They probably had room to spare in that fight seeing as how Sei isn’t reacting at all to that horrendous wound on Yuiitsu’s body.

Even thinking about it is causing me a headache… *Sigh*

As we walk along, suddenly Yuiitsu took something out of thin air! This means they must know Space magic.

More and more questions are piling up, but at least I can be certain. If I am able to get the information they hold, our magic knowledge will increase by leaps and bounds!

They’re creatures from a different world, and with their strength, it’s impossible they know nothing.

Even studying their bodies can probably lead to revolutions.

But the real questions is how do I get them to share the knowledge they know.

One way is to trade, but I won’t be certain they’d truthfully give us their information.

Sure they’re kind hearted before, but this knowledge can determine their life and death, so I doubt they’d truthfully give that kind of information out.

Another way is to get them to take a disciple I guess.

It’d be nice if I can get them attached to my son and have them take him in as a disciple, then teach him their knowledge. Even if it’s not my son, any other student is fine, at least their knowledge circulates in our world.

But for either one to happen, I still have to get on their good side…

While acting like I don’t know about their injuries and what they were just doing, we walked along. But after Yuiitsu drank whatever was in that glass bottle, she covered her mouth and ran behind a tree?

Ah it seems she’s barfing!?

After she barfed whatever it was all out…

*Rumble*

The tree…

Holy goddess!!!

!?

It grew!

It frigging grew like crazy!

Before it was a tree around 4 meters tall.

But now, it grew around 10 times its previous size!

Sure there might be magic that does this, but even that’d be extremely advanced magic!

But instead of super advanced magic, she made it happen just by barfing!

I don’t know what I currently look like, but I know my poker face is gone right now and I’m probably standing there with my mouth agape looking like an idiot.

But I can’t help myself, since from the tree, I can feel a huge amount of magic power radiating outwards.

And that’s not the end of it.

From the base of the tree, a dryad slowly emerged!

A dryad for pete sakes! An B rank sentient monster!

She herself is has enough power to destroy a whole city or two!

Normally this only happens when a tree has collected mana for over ten thousand years and even then the mana might be not pure enough for them to evolve, but this one isn’t even a hundred years old!

What in the world did she barf!?

---

Looking at the tree from Sei’s angle a woman was literally pushing herself out of the tree.

First two arms formed from the trunk and slowly they pushed on the tree. From in between the arms a young woman wearing leaves emerged.

As she got out, she slowly knelt before Yuiitsu?

“To thank you for your gift, this one is willing to serve.”

…

What just happened?

I was standing there, staring at the woman not knowing how to reply…

I mean… she just emerged from a tree...

The tree I just barfed on...

Instead of complaining, she's willing to serve me?

What kind of situation is this!?

I looked at the headmaster for help wanting to ask him how to deal with this, but instead of seeing the dignified headmaster from before, I see an old man with their mouth open agape and even a little bit of drool coming out from the side.

I follow his line of sight…

…

Yup he’s watching her chest…

…

Gee, I wonder why…

Glaring at the old man,

“”Pervert.””
Your that old already! Don’t you have any shame? And with your age, I doubt you’ve never seen a woman before, so you have to be exaggerate so much?

chapters.name: Chapter 15: Food?
chapters.content:
This ones longer than usual

More boring too.As for being late >.

Love this novel? Read it on Royal Road to ensure the author gets credit.

Both fallen and angels are at least B+ rank monsters, so these two must be strong to be alive after being persecuted.

As I watched them following behind the headmaster, trying to figure out why they’re here, the black one suddenly took a bottle out of thin air and moved away from the white one revealing the hideous wound across her body.

Across her body, there was a gash that went the whole way through!

How is she alive!?

She chugged the bottle of red liquid and immediately covered her mouth. With a clearly unhappy face, she ran in my direction.

‘I’m sorry! I don’t know what I did wrong, but I’ll apologize. PLEASE DON’T KILL ME!’

Ignoring my pleas, she continued to run at me.

Not wanting to see my own end, I looked away, waiting for my dark end to come…

…

Still waiting…

Geez woman, can you hurry it up!

Looking back, I saw she just standing there. Standing over a pool of red liquid that was beside me emitting a healing aura. Just by being near it, I can feel it's power slowly healing my soul.

Is that for me?

Free stuff, so why not.

I slowly absorbed the liquid, but the moment I touched it, I felt a giant wave of mana washing over me.

It was a massive amount of pure mana giving off a healing presence.

The more I took in, the better I felt.

I couldn’t help myself, it felt so good absorbing it!

I kept absorbing not even caring about my surroundings because absorbing this weird red liquid felt that good!

After I finished absorbing it all, I felt weird.

I felt as if I was in a cage, it was a soft cage that felt good to be in, but I suddenly had an urge to go out of it.

Reaching my arms out, I slowly pushed myself out of the cage.

Ahhhh the feeling of wind on my skin feels so good.

…

Wait skin?

I looked down only to notice that I actually had a body now!

After I checked my status, I was amazed!

Before I was just a tree, a normal everyday tree that’s G rank. Even a normal human child is F rank since they can attack, but being a tree I couldn’t do anything.

But now, I’m B+ rank!

Not only that, I’m even a variant!

Then chances of being a variant is like one in thousands or more, it’s extremely rare!

I’m amazing now!

This person has bestowed me with such a blessing I will serve her for life!

I immediately knelt before her to show my loyalty, but only to be asked back after the white one kicked the headmaster. Poor guy, I could feel as if a bone broke, I don’t know how, but I just can.

“”Can you cook?””

…

…

Mistresses, I think you’re forgetting I was a tree right? OF COURSE I CAN’T COOK!

But they had an expression that was like, ‘if you can’t, then we do not need you’.

In order to repay them, I lied through my teeth, saying I could, but the moment I did, they stopped talking and just stood there.

And I waited…

I could clearly feel cold sweat pouring down my back…

""Are you okay?""

Hearing that, I instantly make an excuse.

Please don’t find out, please don’t find out, please…

Like a mantra I chanted it in my mind, but reality is harsh.

In a low and menacing voice, they asked,

“”What are you hiding?””

“Eeep”

They know!

What do I do!

Ok don’t panic everything is going to be okay, I’ll just tell them the truth and beg for forgiveness.

But before I could, they said,

“”Well, it’s fine, we don’t need to know, you just have to be able to cook.””

Eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeep

What do I do!

Mistresses I can’t cook!

“”Come follow us.”

Turning around, they went back to the headmaster, and I followed, as he slowly explained to them about the misunderstanding of him being a pervert.

I could see them having an embarrassed face while looking down!

IT WAS CUTE BEYOND COMPARE!

Ahhh I felt like I was in heaven again, as good as drinking that red stuff.

Today I have learned, cuteness is justice.

I wanted to just go up and hug them, but I controlled myself, since they are my mistresses.

As I was daydreaming, it seems we have arrived at our destination.

---

Fu… it seems I misunderstood.

Considering his old age, I guess it makes more sense that he was surprised by what happened just like me and not staring at her chest for personal reasons.

After his explanation, I was extremely embarrassed, so we passed the rest of the way in awkward silence.

Following behind me is that dryad girl, I have to do something about her, since she’s wearing just leaves.

Thankfully currently it’s in the middle of the night, so we didn’t get caught up in any trouble along the way.

After a while, we arrived at a castle…

…

That’s right a castle…

You know, the academy itself was modest in appearance, but this, this takes the cake.

It was three times taller than the academy itself, and just as big too.

“Come, I’ll show you to your room.”

Following behind the headmaster, my face cramped more and more looking at the inside.

Compared to the hallways in the academy, this is insane!

There was a red carpet, chandeliers of glass? Or is that diamond? With the walls painted gold filled with paintings and flower vases on both sides.

…

I was curious beyond compare,

“”Why…””

Before I could finish the sentence, the headmaster answered in a matter of fact manner,

“Nobles.”

…

Can confirm, fantasy setting is in full throttle right now…

Following behind the headmaster, I know I’ll get lost again, I just know it… *Sigh*

Turning around multiple corners, going up and down multiple stairs, we finally stopped in front of a door that was also painted gold…

“Well, here we are, room 248. There’s a maid inside that will help you settle down and teach you what you need to know.”

I took the key out of the inventory and hid both my wings and swords. I left the clothing because I still haven’t gotten my uniform yet.

And as for the headmaster, he just teleported away leaving us there.
Wait! I still don’t know where the cafeteria is!
